{Rām, Bā, 1}
tapaḥsvādhyāyanirataṃ tapasvī vāgvidāṃ varam | [Rām, Bā, 1 1.1]
nāradaṃ paripapraccha vālmīkir munipuṃgavam | [Rām, Bā, 1 1.2]
ko nv asmin sāmprataṃ loke guṇavān kaś ca vīryavān | [Rām, Bā, 1 2.1]
dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca satyavākyo dṛḍhavrataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 2.2]
cāritreṇa ca ko yuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu ko hitaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 3.1]
vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaś ca kaś caikapriyadarśanaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 3.2]
ātmavān ko jitakrodho matimān ko 'nasūyakaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 4.1]
kasya bibhyati devāś ca jātaroṣasya saṃyuge | [Rām, Bā, 1 4.2]
etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me | [Rām, Bā, 1 5.1]
maharṣe tvaṃ samartho 'si jñātum evaṃvidhaṃ naram | [Rām, Bā, 1 5.2]
śrutvā caitat trilokajño vālmīker nārado vacaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 6.1]
śrūyatām iti cāmantrya prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Bā, 1 6.2]
bahavo durlabhāś caiva ye tvayā kīrtitā guṇāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 7.1]
mune vakṣyāmy ahaṃ buddhvā tair yuktaḥ śrūyatāṃ naraḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 7.2]
ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 8.1]
niyatātmā mahāvīryo dyutimān dhṛtimān vaśī | [Rām, Bā, 1 8.2]
buddhimān nītimān vāgmī śrīmāñ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 9.1]
vipulāṃso mahābāhuḥ kambugrīvo mahāhanuḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 9.2]
mahorasko maheṣvāso gūḍhajatrur ariṃdamaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 10.1]
ājānubāhuḥ suśirāḥ sulalāṭaḥ suvikramaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 10.2]
samaḥ samavibhaktāṅgaḥ snigdhavarṇaḥ pratāpavān | [Rām, Bā, 1 11.1]
pīnavakṣā viśālākṣo lakṣmīvāñ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 11.2]
dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 12.1]
yaśasvī jñānasampannaḥ śucir vaśyaḥ samādhimān | [Rām, Bā, 1 12.2]
rakṣitā jīvalokasya dharmasya parirakṣitā | [Rām, Bā, 1 13.1]
vedavedāṅgatattvajño dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 13.2]
sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñaḥ smṛtimān pratibhānavān | [Rām, Bā, 1 14.1]
sarvalokapriyaḥ sādhur adīnātmā vicakṣaṇaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 14.2]
sarvadābhigataḥ sadbhiḥ samudra iva sindhubhiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 15.1]
āryaḥ sarvasamaś caiva sadaikapriyadarśanaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 15.2]
sa ca sarvaguṇopetaḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 16.1]
samudra iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva | [Rām, Bā, 1 16.2]
viṣṇunā sadṛśo vīrye somavat priyadarśanaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 17.1]
kālāgnisadṛśaḥ krodhe kṣamayā pṛthivīsamaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 17.2]
dhanadena samas tyāge satye dharma ivāparaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 18.1]
tam evaṃguṇasampannaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam | [Rām, Bā, 1 18.2]
jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaguṇair yuktaṃ priyaṃ daśarathaḥ sutam | [Rām, Bā, 1 19.1]
yauvarājyena saṃyoktum aicchat prītyā mahīpatiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 19.2]
tasyābhiṣekasambhārān dṛṣṭvā bhāryātha kaikayī | [Rām, Bā, 1 20.1]
pūrvaṃ dattavarā devī varam enam ayācata | [Rām, Bā, 1 20.2]
vivāsanaṃ ca rāmasya bharatasyābhiṣecanam | [Rām, Bā, 1 20.3]
sa satyavacanād rājā dharmapāśena saṃyataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 21.1]
vivāsayāmāsa sutaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathaḥ priyam | [Rām, Bā, 1 21.2]
sa jagāma vanaṃ vīraḥ pratijñām anupālayan | [Rām, Bā, 1 22.1]
pitur vacananirdeśāt kaikeyyāḥ priyakāraṇāt | [Rām, Bā, 1 22.2]
taṃ vrajantaṃ priyo bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha | [Rām, Bā, 1 23.1]
snehād vinayasampannaḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 23.2]
sarvalakṣaṇasampannā nārīṇām uttamā vadhūḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 24.1]
sītāpy anugatā rāmaṃ śaśinaṃ rohiṇī yathā | [Rām, Bā, 1 24.2]
paurair anugato dūraṃ pitrā daśarathena ca | [Rām, Bā, 1 25.1]
śṛṅgaverapure sūtaṃ gaṅgākūle vyasarjayat | [Rām, Bā, 1 25.2]
te vanena vanaṃ gatvā nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 26.1]
citrakūṭam anuprāpya bharadvājasya śāsanāt | [Rām, Bā, 1 26.2]
ramyam āvasathaṃ kṛtvā ramamāṇā vane trayaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 27.1]
devagandharvasaṃkāśās tatra te nyavasan sukham | [Rām, Bā, 1 27.2]
citrakūṭaṃ gate rāme putraśokāturas tadā | [Rām, Bā, 1 28.1]
rājā daśarathaḥ svargaṃ jagāma vilapan sutam | [Rām, Bā, 1 28.2]
mṛte tu tasmin bharato vasiṣṭhapramukhair dvijaiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 29.1]
niyujyamāno rājyāya naicchad rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 29.2]
sa jagāma vanaṃ vīro rāmapādaprasādakaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 29.3]
pāduke cāsya rājyāya nyāsaṃ dattvā punaḥ punaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 30.1]
nivartayāmāsa tato bharataṃ bharatāgrajaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 30.2]
sa kāmam anavāpyaiva rāmapādāv upaspṛśan | [Rām, Bā, 1 31.1]
nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ rāmāgamanakāṅkṣayā | [Rām, Bā, 1 31.2]
rāmas tu punar ālakṣya nāgarasya janasya ca | [Rām, Bā, 1 32.1]
tatrāgamanam ekāgre daṇḍakān praviveśa ha | [Rām, Bā, 1 32.2]
virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ hatvā śarabhaṅgaṃ dadarśa ha | [Rām, Bā, 1 33.1]
sutīkṣṇaṃ cāpy agastyaṃ ca agastyabhrātaraṃ tathā | [Rām, Bā, 1 33.2]
agastyavacanāc caiva jagrāhaindraṃ śarāsanam | [Rām, Bā, 1 34.1]
khaḍgaṃ ca paramaprītas tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau | [Rām, Bā, 1 34.2]
vasatas tasya rāmasya vane vanacaraiḥ saha | [Rām, Bā, 1 35.1]
ṛṣayo 'bhyāgaman sarve vadhāyāsurarakṣasām | [Rām, Bā, 1 35.2]
tena tatraiva vasatā janasthānanivāsinī | [Rām, Bā, 1 36.1]
virūpitā śūrpaṇakhā rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī | [Rām, Bā, 1 36.2]
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāvākyād udyuktān sarvarākṣasān | [Rām, Bā, 1 37.1]
kharaṃ triśirasaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ caiva rākṣasam | [Rām, Bā, 1 37.2]
nijaghāna raṇe rāmas teṣāṃ caiva padānugān | [Rām, Bā, 1 38.1]
rakṣasāṃ nihatāny āsan sahasrāṇi caturdaśa | [Rām, Bā, 1 38.2]
tato jñātivadhaṃ śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 39.1]
sahāyaṃ varayāmāsa mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasam | [Rām, Bā, 1 39.2]
vāryamāṇaḥ subahuśo mārīcena sa rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 40.1]
na virodho balavatā kṣamo rāvaṇa tena te | [Rām, Bā, 1 40.2]
anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 41.1]
jagāma sahamarīcas tasyāśramapadaṃ tadā | [Rām, Bā, 1 41.2]
tena māyāvinā dūram apavāhya nṛpātmajau | [Rām, Bā, 1 42.1]
jahāra bhāryāṃ rāmasya gṛdhraṃ hatvā jaṭāyuṣam | [Rām, Bā, 1 42.2]
gṛdhraṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛtāṃ śrutvā ca maithilīm | [Rām, Bā, 1 43.1]
rāghavaḥ śokasaṃtapto vilalāpākulendriyaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 43.2]
tatas tenaiva śokena gṛdhraṃ dagdhvā jaṭāyuṣam | [Rām, Bā, 1 44.1]
mārgamāṇo vane sītāṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃdadarśa ha | [Rām, Bā, 1 44.2]
kabandhaṃ nāma rūpeṇa vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam | [Rām, Bā, 1 45.1]
taṃ nihatya mahābāhur dadāha svargataś ca saḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 45.2]
sa cāsya kathayāmāsa śabarīṃ dharmacāriṇīm | [Rām, Bā, 1 46.1]
śramaṇīṃ dharmanipuṇām abhigaccheti rāghava | [Rām, Bā, 1 46.2]
so 'bhyagacchan mahātejāḥ śabarīṃ śatrusūdanaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 46.3]
śabaryā pūjitaḥ samyag rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 47.1]
pampātīre hanumatā saṃgato vānareṇa ha | [Rām, Bā, 1 47.2]
hanumadvacanāc caiva sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 48.1]
sugrīvāya ca tat sarvaṃ śaṃsad rāmo mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 48.2]
tato vānararājena vairānukathanaṃ prati | [Rām, Bā, 1 49.1]
rāmāyāveditaṃ sarvaṃ praṇayād duḥkhitena ca | [Rām, Bā, 1 49.2]
vālinaś ca balaṃ tatra kathayāmāsa vānaraḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 49.3]
pratijñātaṃ ca rāmeṇa tadā vālivadhaṃ prati | [Rām, Bā, 1 50.1]
sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaś cāsīn nityaṃ vīryeṇa rāghave | [Rām, Bā, 1 50.2]
rāghavaḥ pratyayārthaṃ tu dundubheḥ kāyam uttamam | [Rām, Bā, 1 51.1]
pādāṅguṣṭhena cikṣepa sampūrṇaṃ daśayojanam | [Rām, Bā, 1 51.2]
bibheda ca punaḥ sālān saptaikena maheṣuṇā | [Rām, Bā, 1 52.1]
giriṃ rasātalaṃ caiva janayan pratyayaṃ tadā | [Rām, Bā, 1 52.2]
tataḥ prītamanās tena viśvastaḥ sa mahākapiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 53.1]
kiṣkindhāṃ rāmasahito jagāma ca guhāṃ tadā | [Rām, Bā, 1 53.2]
tato 'garjaddharivaraḥ sugrīvo hemapiṅgalaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 54.1]
tena nādena mahatā nirjagāma harīśvaraḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 54.2]
tataḥ sugrīvavacanāddhatvā vālinam āhave | [Rām, Bā, 1 55.1]
sugrīvam eva tad rājye rāghavaḥ pratyapādayat | [Rām, Bā, 1 55.2]
sa ca sarvān samānīya vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 56.1]
diśaḥ prasthāpayāmāsa didṛkṣur janakātmajām | [Rām, Bā, 1 56.2]
tato gṛdhrasya vacanāt sampāter hanumān balī | [Rām, Bā, 1 57.1]
śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ pupluve lavaṇārṇavam | [Rām, Bā, 1 57.2]
tatra laṅkāṃ samāsādya purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām | [Rām, Bā, 1 58.1]
dadarśa sītāṃ dhyāyantīm aśokavanikāṃ gatām | [Rām, Bā, 1 58.2]
nivedayitvābhijñānaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca nivedya ca | [Rām, Bā, 1 59.1]
samāśvāsya ca vaidehīṃ mardayāmāsa toraṇam | [Rām, Bā, 1 59.2]
pañca senāgragān hatvā sapta mantrisutān api | [Rām, Bā, 1 60.1]
śūram akṣaṃ ca niṣpiṣya grahaṇaṃ samupāgamat | [Rām, Bā, 1 60.2]
astreṇonmuham ātmānaṃ jñātvā paitāmahād varāt | [Rām, Bā, 1 61.1]
marṣayan rākṣasān vīro yantriṇas tān yadṛcchayā | [Rām, Bā, 1 61.2]
tato dagdhvā purīṃ laṅkām ṛte sītāṃ ca maithilīm | [Rām, Bā, 1 62.1]
rāmāya priyam ākhyātuṃ punar āyān mahākapiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 62.2]
so 'bhigamya mahātmānaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ pradakṣiṇam | [Rām, Bā, 1 63.1]
nyavedayad ameyātmā dṛṣṭā sīteti tattvataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 63.2]
tataḥ sugrīvasahito gatvā tīraṃ mahodadheḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 64.1]
samudraṃ kṣobhayāmāsa śarair ādityasaṃnibhaiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 64.2]
darśayāmāsa cātmānaṃ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 65.1]
samudravacanāc caiva nalaṃ setum akārayat | [Rām, Bā, 1 65.2]
tena gatvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave | [Rām, Bā, 1 66.1]
abhyaṣiñcat sa laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasendraṃ vibhīṣaṇam | [Rām, Bā, 1 66.2]
karmaṇā tena mahatā trailokyaṃ sacarācaram | [Rām, Bā, 1 67.1]
sadevarṣigaṇaṃ tuṣṭaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 67.2]
tathā paramasaṃtuṣṭaiḥ pūjitaḥ sarvadaivataiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 68.1]
kṛtakṛtyas tadā rāmo vijvaraḥ pramumoda ha | [Rām, Bā, 1 68.2]
devatābhyo varān prāpya samutthāpya ca vānarān | [Rām, Bā, 1 69.1]
puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya nandigrāmaṃ yayau tadā | [Rām, Bā, 1 69.2]
nandigrāme jaṭāṃ hitvā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'naghaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 70.1]
rāmaḥ sītām anuprāpya rājyaṃ punar avāptavān | [Rām, Bā, 1 70.2]
prahṛṣṭamudito lokas tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ sudhārmikaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 71.1]
nirāyamo arogaś ca durbhikṣabhayavarjitaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 71.2]
na putramaraṇaṃ kecid drakṣyanti puruṣāḥ kvacit | [Rām, Bā, 1 72.1]
nāryaś cāvidhavā nityaṃ bhaviṣyanti pativratāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 72.2]
na vātajaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃcin nāpsu majjanti jantavaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 73.1]
na cāgrijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃcid yathā kṛtayuge tathā | [Rām, Bā, 1 73.2]
aśvamedhaśatair iṣṭvā tathā bahusuvarṇakaiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 74.1]
gavāṃ koṭyayutaṃ dattvā vidvadbhyo vidhipūrvakam | [Rām, Bā, 1 74.2]
rājavaṃśāñ śataguṇān sthāpayiṣyati rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 75.1]
cāturvarṇyaṃ ca loke 'smin sve sve dharme niyokṣyati | [Rām, Bā, 1 75.2]
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca | [Rām, Bā, 1 76.1]
rāmo rājyam upāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati | [Rām, Bā, 1 76.2]
idaṃ pavitraṃ pāpaghnaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam | [Rām, Bā, 1 77.1]
yaḥ paṭhed rāmacaritaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate | [Rām, Bā, 1 77.2]
etad ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ paṭhan rāmāyaṇaṃ naraḥ | [Rām, Bā, 1 78.1]
saputrapautraḥ sagaṇaḥ pretya svarge mahīyate | [Rām, Bā, 1 78.2]

{Rām, Bā, 2}
nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 1.1]
pūjayāmāsa dharmātmā sahaśiṣyo mahāmuniḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 1.2]
yathāvat pūjitas tena devarṣir nāradas tadā | [Rām, Bā, 2 2.1]
āpṛṣṭvaivābhyanujñātaḥ sa jagāma vihāyasam | [Rām, Bā, 2 2.2]
sa muhūrtaṃ gate tasmin devalokaṃ munis tadā | [Rām, Bā, 2 3.1]
jagāma tamasātīraṃ jāhnavyās tv avidūrataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 3.2]
sa tu tīraṃ samāsādya tamasāyā mahāmuniḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 4.1]
śiṣyam āha sthitaṃ pārśve dṛṣṭvā tīrtham akardamam | [Rām, Bā, 2 4.2]
akardamam idaṃ tīrthaṃ bharadvāja niśāmaya | [Rām, Bā, 2 5.1]
ramaṇīyaṃ prasannāmbu sanmanuṣyamano yathā | [Rām, Bā, 2 5.2]
nyasyatāṃ kalaśas tāta dīyatāṃ valkalaṃ mama | [Rām, Bā, 2 6.1]
idam evāvagāhiṣye tamasātīrtham uttamam | [Rām, Bā, 2 6.2]
evam ukto bharadvājo vālmīkena mahātmanā | [Rām, Bā, 2 7.1]
prāyacchata munes tasya valkalaṃ niyato guroḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 7.2]
sa śiṣyahastād ādāya valkalaṃ niyatendriyaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 8.1]
vicacāra ha paśyaṃs tat sarvato vipulaṃ vanam | [Rām, Bā, 2 8.2]
tasyābhyāśe tu mithunaṃ carantam anapāyinam | [Rām, Bā, 2 9.1]
dadarśa bhagavāṃs tatra krauñcayoś cāruniḥsvanam | [Rām, Bā, 2 9.2]
tasmāt tu mithunād ekaṃ pumāṃsaṃ pāpaniścayaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 10.1]
jaghāna vairanilayo niṣādas tasya paśyataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 10.2]
taṃ śoṇitaparītāṅgaṃ veṣṭamānaṃ mahītale | [Rām, Bā, 2 11.1]
bhāryā tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rurāva karuṇāṃ giram | [Rām, Bā, 2 11.2]
tathā tu taṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣādena nipātitam | [Rām, Bā, 2 12.1]
ṛṣer dharmātmanas tasya kāruṇyaṃ samapadyata | [Rām, Bā, 2 12.2]
tataḥ karuṇaveditvād adharmo 'yam iti dvijaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 13.1]
niśāmya rudatīṃ krauñcīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt | [Rām, Bā, 2 13.2]
mā niṣāda pratiṣṭhāṃ tvam agamaḥ śāśvatīṃ samāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 14.1]
yat krauñcamithunād ekam avadhīḥ kāmamohitam | [Rām, Bā, 2 14.2]
tasyaivaṃ bruvataś cintā babhūva hṛdi vīkṣataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 15.1]
śokārtenāsya śakuneḥ kim idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayā | [Rām, Bā, 2 15.2]
cintayan sa mahāprājñaś cakāra matimān matim | [Rām, Bā, 2 16.1]
śiṣyaṃ caivābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 16.2]
pādabaddho 'kṣarasamas tantrīlayasamanvitaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 2 17.1]
śokārtasya pravṛtto me śloko bhavatu nānyathā | [Rām, Bā, 2 17.2]

{Rām, Bā, 10}

{Rām, Bā, 11}

{Rām, Bā, 12}

{Rām, Bā, 19}
tac chrutvā rājaśārdūla viśvāmitrasya bhāṣitam | [Rām, Bā, 19 1.1]

māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām | [Rām, Bā, 19 13.2]
sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kathaṃ teṣāṃ mayā raṇe | [Rām, Bā, 19 14.1]

tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata | [Rām, Bā, 19 15.1]
paulastyavaṃśaprabhavo rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 19 15.2]
sa brahmaṇā dattavaras trailokyaṃ bādhate bhṛśam | [Rām, Bā, 19 16.1]

ity ukto muninā tena rājovāca muniṃ tadā | [Rām, Bā, 19 19.1]

sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ dharmajña kuruṣva mama putrake | [Rām, Bā, 19 20.1]
devadānavagandharvā yakṣāḥ patagapannagāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 19 20.2]
na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ soḍhuṃ kiṃ punar mānavā yudhi | [Rām, Bā, 19 21.1]
sa hi vīryavatāṃ vīryam ādatte yudhi rākṣasaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 19 21.2]
tena cāhaṃ na śakto 'smi saṃyoddhuṃ tasya vā balaiḥ | [Rām, Bā, 19 22.1]

katham apy amaraprakhyaṃ saṃgrāmāṇām akovidam | [Rām, Bā, 19 23.1]
bālaṃ me tanayaṃ brahman naiva dāsyāmi putrakam | [Rām, Bā, 19 23.2]

{Rām, Bā, 20}

{Rām, Bā, 21}

{Rām, Bā, 22}

{Rām, Bā, 23}

{Rām, Bā, 29}

sa tena paramāstreṇa mānavena samāhitaḥ | [Rām, Bā, 29 15.1]
sampūrṇaṃ yojanaśataṃ kṣiptaḥ sāgarasamplave | [Rām, Bā, 29 15.2]

{Rām, Bā, 30}
atha tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra kṛtārthau rāmalakṣmaṇau | [Rām, Bā, 30 1.1]

taddhi yajñaphalaṃ tena maithilenottamaṃ dhanuḥ | [Rām, Bā, 30 12.1]

{Rām, Bā, 31}
brahmayonir mahān āsīt kuśo nāma mahātapāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 31 1.1]

dīptiyuktān mahotsāhān kṣatradharmacikīrṣayā | [Rām, Bā, 31 2.2]

āmodaṃ paramaṃ jagmur varābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 31 11.2]

udyānabhūmim āgamya tārā iva ghanāntare | [Rām, Bā, 31 12.2]
tāḥ sarvaguṇasampannā rūpayauvanasaṃyutāḥ | [Rām, Bā, 31 13.1]
dṛṣṭvā sarvātmako vāyur idaṃ vacanam abravīt | [Rām, Bā, 31 13.2]
ahaṃ vaḥ kāmaye sarvā bhāryā mama bhaviṣyatha | [Rām, Bā, 31 14.1]
mānuṣas tyajyatāṃ bhāvo dīrgham āyur avāpsyatha | [Rām, Bā, 31 14.2]

apahāsya tato vākyaṃ kanyāśatam athābravīt | [Rām, Bā, 31 15.2]
antaś carasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ surottama | [Rām, Bā, 31 16.1]
prabhāvajñāś ca te sarvāḥ kim asmān avamanyase | [Rām, Bā, 31 16.2]

{Rām, Bā, 32}
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ | [Rām, Bā, 32 1.1]

{Rām, Bā, 44}

{Rām, Bā, 69}

{Rām, Bā, 70}

{Rām, Ay, 16}

{Rām, Ay, 33}

cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam | [Rām, Ay, 33 12.2]
tasyāṃ cīraṃ vasānāyāṃ nāthavatyām anāthavat | [Rām, Ay, 33 13.1]
pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti | [Rām, Ay, 33 13.2]
sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt | [Rām, Ay, 33 14.1]

{Rām, Ay, 35}
atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ | [Rām, Ay, 35 1.1]

{Rām, Ay, 36}
tasmiṃs tu puruṣavyāghre niṣkrāmati kṛtāñjalau | [Rām, Ay, 36 1.1]
ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān | [Rām, Ay, 36 1.2]
anāthasya janasyāsya durbalasya tapasvinaḥ | [Rām, Ay, 36 2.1]

sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ | [Rām, Ay, 36 8.1]
putraśokābhisaṃtaptaḥ śrutvā cāsīt suduḥkhitaḥ | [Rām, Ay, 36 8.2]
nāgnihotrāṇy ahūyanta sūryaś cāntaradhīyata | [Rām, Ay, 36 9.1]

{Rām, Ay, 66}

{Rām, Ay, 68}

{Rām, Ay, 94}

so 'yaṃ brāhmaṇabhūyiṣṭho vānaprasthagaṇo mahān | [Rām, Ār, 5 14.1]
tvannātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam | [Rām, Ār, 5 14.2]
ehi paśya śarīrāṇi munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām | [Rām, Ār, 5 15.1]
hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane | [Rām, Ār, 5 15.2]
pampānadīnivāsānām anumandākinīm api | [Rām, Ār, 5 16.1]
citrakūṭālayānāṃ ca kriyate kadanaṃ mahat | [Rām, Ār, 5 16.2]
evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ tapasvinām | [Rām, Ār, 5 17.1]
kriyamāṇaṃ vane ghoraṃ rakṣobhir bhīmakarmabhiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 5 17.2]
tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ | [Rām, Ār, 5 18.1]
paripālaya no rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 5 18.2]
etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām | [Rām, Ār, 5 19.1]
idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 5 19.2]

bhavatām arthasiddhyartham āgato 'haṃ yadṛcchayā | [Rām, Ār, 5 20.1]
tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 5 20.2]
tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān | [Rām, Ār, 5 20.3]

{Rām, Ār, 6}
rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 6 1.1]

aham evāhariṣyāmi svayaṃ lokān mahāmune | [Rām, Ār, 6 13.1]
āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane | [Rām, Ār, 6 13.2]
bhavān sarvatra kuśalaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ | [Rām, Ār, 6 14.1]

evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 6 15.1]

ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha | [Rām, Ār, 6 16.1]
ṛṣisaṃghānucaritaḥ sadā mūlaphalair yutaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 6 16.2]

{Rām, Ār, 7}

{Rām, Ār, 8}
sutīkṣṇenābhyanujñātaṃ prasthitaṃ raghunandanam | [Rām, Ār, 8 1.1]

sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ | [Rām, Ār, 8 15.2]

{Rām, Ār, 9}
vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā | [Rām, Ār, 9 1.1]

tataḥ parvataśṛṅgāṇi vanāni vividhāni ca | [Rām, Ār, 16 24.1]

ucchettāraṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ paradārābhimarśanam | [Rām, Ār, 30 12.1]
sarvadivyāstrayoktāraṃ yajñavighnakaraṃ sadā | [Rām, Ār, 30 12.2]
purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim | [Rām, Ār, 30 13.1]
takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 30 13.2]
kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā vijitya naravāhanam | [Rām, Ār, 30 14.1]
vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 30 14.2]
vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam | [Rām, Ār, 30 15.1]
vināśayati yaḥ krodhād devodyānāni vīryavān | [Rām, Ār, 30 15.2]
candrasūryau mahābhāgāv uttiṣṭhantau paraṃtapau | [Rām, Ār, 30 16.1]
nivārayati bāhubhyāṃ yaḥ śailaśikharopamaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 30 16.2]
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane | [Rām, Ār, 30 17.1]
purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 30 17.2]
devadānavagandharvapiśācapatagoragaiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 30 18.1]
abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte | [Rām, Ār, 30 18.2]
mantrair abhiṣutaṃ puṇyam adhvareṣu dvijātibhiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 30 19.1]
havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 30 19.2]
āptayajñaharaṃ krūraṃ brahmaghnaṃ duṣṭacāriṇam | [Rām, Ār, 30 20.1]
karkaśaṃ niranukrośaṃ prajānām ahite ratam | [Rām, Ār, 30 20.2]
rāvaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvalokabhayāvaham | [Rām, Ār, 30 20.3]
rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam | [Rām, Ār, 30 21.1]
taṃ divyavastrābharaṇaṃ divyamālyopaśobhitam | [Rām, Ār, 30 21.2]
rākṣasendraṃ mahābhāgaṃ paulastyakulanandanam | [Rām, Ār, 30 21.3]
tam abravīd dīptaviśālalocanaṃ pradarśayitvā bhayamohamūrchitā | [Rām, Ār, 30 22.1]
sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā | [Rām, Ār, 30 22.2]
{Rām, Ār, 31}
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā dīnā rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam | [Rām, Ār, 31 1.1]
amātyamadhye saṃkruddhā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Ār, 31 1.2]
pramattaḥ kāmabhogeṣu svairavṛtto niraṅkuśaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 2.1]
samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ boddhavyaṃ nāvabudhyase | [Rām, Ār, 31 2.2]
saktaṃ grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu kāmavṛttaṃ mahīpatim | [Rām, Ār, 31 3.1]
lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 3.2]
svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 4.1]
sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati | [Rām, Ār, 31 4.2]
ayuktacāraṃ durdarśam asvādhīnaṃ narādhipam | [Rām, Ār, 31 5.1]
varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 5.2]

ātmavadbhir vigṛhya tvaṃ devagandharvadānavaiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 7.1]
ayuktacāraś capalaḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi | [Rām, Ār, 31 7.2]
yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara | [Rām, Ār, 31 8.1]

yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 9.1]
cāreṇa tasmād ucyante rājāno dīrghacakṣuṣaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 9.2]
ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam | [Rām, Ār, 31 10.1]
svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase | [Rām, Ār, 31 10.2]
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām | [Rām, Ār, 31 11.1]
hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 11.2]
ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 12.1]
dharṣitaṃ ca janasthānaṃ rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā | [Rām, Ār, 31 12.2]
tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa | [Rām, Ār, 31 13.1]
viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase | [Rām, Ār, 31 13.2]
tīkṣṇam alpapradātāraṃ pramattaṃ garvitaṃ śaṭham | [Rām, Ār, 31 14.1]
vyasane sarvabhūtāni nābhidhāvanti pārthivam | [Rām, Ār, 31 14.2]
atimāninam agrāhyam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ naram | [Rām, Ār, 31 15.1]
krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano 'pi narādhipam | [Rām, Ār, 31 15.2]
nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca | [Rām, Ār, 31 16.1]
kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Ār, 31 16.2]
śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 17.1]
na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 17.2]
upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā | [Rām, Ār, 31 18.1]
evaṃ rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samartho 'pi nirarthakaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 18.2]
apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 19.1]
kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram | [Rām, Ār, 31 19.2]
nayanābhyāṃ prasupto 'pi jāgarti nayacakṣuṣā | [Rām, Ār, 31 20.1]
vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 20.2]
tvaṃ tu rāvaṇa durbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 21.1]
yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 21.2]
parāvamantā viṣayeṣu saṃgato na deśakālapravibhāgatattvavit | [Rām, Ār, 31 22.1]
ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye vipannarājyo nacirād vipatsyate | [Rām, Ār, 31 22.2]
iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 23.1]
dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito vicintayāmāsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 31 23.2]
{Rām, Ār, 32}
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 1.1]
amātyamadhye saṃkruddhaḥ paripapraccha rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 1.2]
kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃvīryaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparākramaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 2.1]
kimarthaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ praviṣṭaś ca suduścaram | [Rām, Ār, 32 2.2]
āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 3.1]

indreṇevottamaṃ sasyam āhataṃ tv aśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 8.2]
rakṣasāṃ bhīmavīryāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa | [Rām, Ār, 32 9.1]

ardhādhikamuhūrtena kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 10.1]
ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 10.2]
ekā kathaṃcin muktāhaṃ paribhūya mahātmanā | [Rām, Ār, 32 11.1]
strīvadhaṃ śaṅkamānena rāmeṇa viditātmanā | [Rām, Ār, 32 11.2]
bhrātā cāsya mahātejā guṇatas tulyavikramaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 12.1]
anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān | [Rām, Ār, 32 12.2]
amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī | [Rām, Ār, 32 13.1]
rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 13.2]
rāmasya tu viśālākṣī dharmapatnī yaśasvinī | [Rām, Ār, 32 14.1]
sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanumadhyamā | [Rām, Ār, 32 14.2]
naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī | [Rām, Ār, 32 15.1]
tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale | [Rām, Ār, 32 15.2]
yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet | [Rām, Ār, 32 16.1]
atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt | [Rām, Ār, 32 16.2]
sā suśīlā vapuḥślāghyā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi | [Rām, Ār, 32 17.1]
tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 17.2]
tāṃ tu vistīrṇajaghanāṃ pīnottuṅgapayodharām | [Rām, Ār, 32 18.1]
bhāryārthe tu tavānetum udyatāhaṃ varānanām | [Rām, Ār, 32 18.2]
tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvādya vaidehīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām | [Rām, Ār, 32 19.1]
manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi | [Rām, Ār, 32 19.2]
yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate | [Rām, Ār, 32 20.1]
śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 20.2]
kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara | [Rām, Ār, 32 21.1]
vadhāt tasya nṛśaṃsasya rāmasyāśramavāsinaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 32 21.2]
taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham | [Rām, Ār, 32 22.1]
hatanāthāṃ sukhaṃ sītāṃ yathāvad upabhokṣyase | [Rām, Ār, 32 22.2]
rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara | [Rām, Ār, 32 23.1]
kriyatāṃ nirviśaṅkena vacanaṃ mama rāghava | [Rām, Ār, 32 23.2]
niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān | [Rām, Ār, 32 24.1]
kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ tvam adya kṛtyaṃ pratipattum arhasi | [Rām, Ār, 32 24.2]
{Rām, Ār, 33}
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāvākyaṃ tac chrutvā romaharṣaṇam | [Rām, Ār, 33 1.1]
sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha | [Rām, Ār, 33 1.2]
tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca | [Rām, Ār, 33 2.1]
doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam | [Rām, Ār, 33 2.2]
iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 33 3.1]

niṣādaviṣayaṃ hatvā śākhayā patagottamaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 33 32.2]

{Rām, Ār, 34}

tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala | [Rām, Ār, 34 14.1]
bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye | [Rām, Ār, 34 14.2]

vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava | [Rām, Ār, 34 15.2]
etadartham ahaṃ prāptas tvatsamīpaṃ niśācara | [Rām, Ār, 34 16.1]
śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama | [Rām, Ār, 34 16.2]

sa rāvaṇaṃ trastaviṣaṇṇacetā mahāvane rāmaparākramajñaḥ | [Rām, Ār, 34 22.1]

{Rām, Ār, 35}

śarārciṣam anādhṛṣyaṃ cāpakhaḍgendhanaṃ raṇe | [Rām, Ār, 35 15.1]

{Rām, Ār, 37}
evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃcit tena saṃyuge | [Rām, Ār, 37 1.1]

{Rām, Su, 4}
tataḥ sa madhyaṃ gatam aṃśumantaṃ jyotsnāvitānaṃ mahad udvamantam | [Rām, Su, 4 1.1]

tato varārhāḥ suviśuddhabhāvās teṣāṃ striyastatra mahānubhāvāḥ | [Rām, Su, 4 14.1]

tataḥ priyān prāpya mano'bhirāmān suprītiyuktāḥ prasamīkṣya rāmāḥ | [Rām, Su, 4 18.1]
gṛheṣu hṛṣṭāḥ paramābhirāmā haripravīraḥ sa dadarśa rāmāḥ | [Rām, Su, 4 18.2]

avyaktalekhām iva candralekhāṃ pāṃsupradigdhām iva hemalekhām | [Rām, Su, 4 23.1]

sītām apaśyanmanujeśvarasya rāmasya patnīṃ vadatāṃ varasya | [Rām, Su, 4 24.1]

{Rām, Su, 5}
sa nikāmaṃ vināmeṣu vicaran kāmarūpadhṛk | [Rām, Su, 5 1.1]
vicacāra kapir laṅkāṃ lāghavena samanvitaḥ | [Rām, Su, 5 1.2]

prākāreṇārkavarṇena bhāsvareṇābhisaṃvṛtam | [Rām, Su, 5 2.2]

{Rām, Su, 19}
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sītā raudrasya rakṣasaḥ | [Rām, Su, 19 1.1]
ārtā dīnasvarā dīnaṃ pratyuvāca śanair vacaḥ | [Rām, Su, 19 1.2]
duḥkhārtā rudatī sītā vepamānā tapasvinī | [Rām, Su, 19 2.1]

abhinandanti bhūtāni vināśe pāpakarmaṇaḥ | [Rām, Su, 19 12.2]
evaṃ tvāṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ vakṣyanti nikṛtā janāḥ | [Rām, Su, 19 13.1]
diṣṭyaitad vyasanaṃ prāpto raudra ityeva harṣitāḥ | [Rām, Su, 19 13.2]
śakyā lobhayituṃ nāham aiśvaryeṇa dhanena vā | [Rām, Su, 19 14.1]

{Rām, Su, 25}

{Rām, Su, 26}

{Rām, Su, 28}

laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet | [Rām, Su, 28 39.2]

{Rām, Su, 29}

{Rām, Su, 30}

{Rām, Su, 31}
tām abravīnmahātejā hanūmānmārutātmajaḥ | [Rām, Su, 31 1.1]

{Rām, Su, 32}
tasyāstadvacanaṃ śrutvā hanūmān hariyūthapaḥ | [Rām, Su, 32 1.1]

{Rām, Su, 34}
bhūya eva mahātejā hanūmānmārutātmajaḥ | [Rām, Su, 34 1.1]

mamaiva tu na duḥkhānām asti manye viparyayaḥ | [Rām, Su, 34 13.2]
kaccicca vyathate rāmaḥ kaccinna paritapyate | [Rām, Su, 34 14.1]
uttarāṇi ca kāryāṇi kurute puruṣottamaḥ | [Rām, Su, 34 14.2]

{Rām, Su, 35}
sītā tadvacanaṃ śrutvā pūrṇacandranibhānanā | [Rām, Su, 35 1.1]

janasthāne vinā bhrātrā śatruḥ kastasya nodvijet | [Rām, Su, 35 16.2]

{Rām, Su, 37}
maṇiṃ dattvā tataḥ sītā hanūmantam athābravīt | [Rām, Su, 37 1.1]

{Rām, Su, 38}

{Rām, Su, 39}

{Rām, Su, 40}

{Rām, Su, 41}
tataḥ sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 1.1]

sa bhūtvā tu mahākāyo hanūmānmārutātmajaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 4.1]
dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayāmāsa laṅkāṃ śabdena pūrayan | [Rām, Su, 41 4.2]
tasyāsphoṭitaśabdena mahatā śrotraghātinā | [Rām, Su, 41 5.1]
petur vihaṃgā gaganād uccaiścedam aghoṣayat | [Rām, Su, 41 5.2]
jayatyatibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaśca mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 6.1]
rājā jayati sugrīvo rāghaveṇābhipālitaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 6.2]
dāso 'haṃ kosalendrasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 7.1]
hanumāñ śatrusainyānāṃ nihantā mārutātmajaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 7.2]
na rāvaṇasahasraṃ me yuddhe pratibalaṃ bhavet | [Rām, Su, 41 8.1]
śilābhistu praharataḥ pādapaiśca sahasraśaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 8.2]
ardayitvā purīṃ laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm | [Rām, Su, 41 9.1]
samṛddhārtho gamiṣyāmi miṣatāṃ sarvarakṣasām | [Rām, Su, 41 9.2]
evam uktvā vimānasthaścaityasthān haripuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 10.1]
nanāda bhīmanirhrādo rakṣasāṃ janayan bhayam | [Rām, Su, 41 10.2]
tena śabdena mahatā caityapālāḥ śataṃ yayuḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 11.1]
gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān | [Rām, Su, 41 11.2]
visṛjanto mahākāyā mārutiṃ paryavārayan | [Rām, Su, 41 11.3]
āvarta iva gaṅgāyāstoyasya vipulo mahān | [Rām, Su, 41 12.1]
parikṣipya hariśreṣṭhaṃ sa babhau rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 12.2]
tato vātātmajaḥ kruddho bhīmarūpaṃ samāsthitaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 13.1]
prāsādasya mahāṃstasya stambhaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam | [Rām, Su, 41 14.1]
utpāṭayitvā vegena hanūmānmārutātmajaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 14.2]
tatastaṃ bhrāmayāmāsa śatadhāraṃ mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 14.3]
sa rākṣasaśataṃ hatvā vajreṇendra ivāsurān | [Rām, Su, 41 15.1]
antarikṣasthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt | [Rām, Su, 41 15.2]
mādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi visṛṣṭāni mahātmanām | [Rām, Su, 41 16.1]
balināṃ vānarendrāṇāṃ sugrīvavaśavartinām | [Rām, Su, 41 16.2]
śataiḥ śatasahasraiśca koṭībhir ayutair api | [Rām, Su, 41 17.1]
āgamiṣyati sugrīvaḥ sarveṣāṃ vo niṣūdanaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 17.2]
neyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyaṃ na ca rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Su, 41 18.1]
yasmād ikṣvākunāthena baddhaṃ vairaṃ mahātmanā | [Rām, Su, 41 18.2]
{Rām, Su, 42}
saṃdiṣṭo rākṣasendreṇa prahastasya suto balī | [Rām, Su, 42 1.1]
jambumālī mahādaṃṣṭro nirjagāma dhanurdharaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 1.2]

vipannaṃ karma tad dṛṣṭvā hanūmāṃścaṇḍavikramaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 11.1]
sālaṃ vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayāmāsa vīryavān | [Rām, Su, 42 11.2]
bhrāmayantaṃ kapiṃ dṛṣṭvā sālavṛkṣaṃ mahābalam | [Rām, Su, 42 12.1]

sālaṃ caturbhiścicheda vānaraṃ pañcabhir bhuje | [Rām, Su, 42 13.1]
urasyekena bāṇena daśabhistu stanāntare | [Rām, Su, 42 13.2]
sa śaraiḥ pūritatanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 14.1]
tam eva parighaṃ gṛhya bhrāmayāmāsa vegitaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 14.2]
ativego 'tivegena bhrāmayitvā balotkaṭaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 15.1]
parighaṃ pātayāmāsa jambumāler mahorasi | [Rām, Su, 42 15.2]
tasya caiva śiro nāsti na bāhū na ca jānunī | [Rām, Su, 42 16.1]
na dhanur na ratho nāśvāstatrādṛśyanta neṣavaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 16.2]
sa hatastarasā tena jambumālī mahārathaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 17.1]
papāta nihato bhūmau cūrṇitāṅgavibhūṣaṇaḥ | [Rām, Su, 42 17.2]

{Rām, Su, 43}
tataste rākṣasendreṇa coditā mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ | [Rām, Su, 43 1.1]
niryayur bhavanāt tasmāt sapta saptārcivarcasaḥ | [Rām, Su, 43 1.2]
mahābalaparīvārā dhanuṣmanto mahābalāḥ | [Rām, Su, 43 2.1]

jananyastāstatasteṣāṃ viditvā kiṃkarān hatān | [Rām, Su, 43 5.1]

abhipetur hanūmantaṃ toraṇastham avasthitam | [Rām, Su, 43 6.2]

sa śarān vañcayāmāsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ | [Rām, Su, 43 9.1]
rathavegāṃśca vīrāṇāṃ vicaran vimale 'mbare | [Rām, Su, 43 9.2]
sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhir vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate | [Rām, Su, 43 10.1]
dhanuṣmadbhir yathā meghair mārutaḥ prabhur ambare | [Rām, Su, 43 10.2]
sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃstāṃ mahācamūm | [Rām, Su, 43 11.1]

kecit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi | [Rām, Su, 43 13.2]
tatasteṣvavapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca | [Rām, Su, 43 14.1]
tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśa bhayārditam | [Rām, Su, 43 14.2]
vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ | [Rām, Su, 43 15.1]

{Rām, Su, 44}
hatānmantrisutān buddhvā vānareṇa mahātmanā | [Rām, Su, 44 1.1]
rāvaṇaḥ saṃvṛtākāraścakāra matim uttamām | [Rām, Su, 44 1.2]
sa virūpākṣayūpākṣau durdharaṃ caiva rākṣasam | [Rām, Su, 44 2.1]
praghasaṃ bhāsakarṇaṃ ca pañcasenāgranāyakān | [Rām, Su, 44 2.2]
saṃdideśa daśagrīvo vīrānnayaviśāradān | [Rām, Su, 44 3.1]
hanūmadgrahaṇe vyagrān vāyuvegasamān yudhi | [Rām, Su, 44 3.2]

savājirathamātaṅgāḥ sa kapiḥ śāsyatām iti | [Rām, Su, 44 4.2]
yat taiśca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam | [Rām, Su, 44 5.1]
karma cāpi samādheyaṃ deśakālavirodhitam | [Rām, Su, 44 5.2]
na hyahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan | [Rām, Su, 44 6.1]
sarvathā tanmahad bhūtaṃ mahābalaparigraham | [Rām, Su, 44 6.2]
bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt | [Rām, Su, 44 6.3]
sanāgayakṣagandharvā devāsuramaharṣayaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 7.1]

nāvamanyo bhavadbhiśca hariḥ krūraparākramaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 9.1]
dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 9.2]

nīlaḥ senāpatiścaiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 10.2]

bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire | [Rām, Su, 44 13.2]
tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe | [Rām, Su, 44 14.1]
ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā | [Rām, Su, 44 14.2]
te svāmivacanaṃ sarve pratigṛhya mahaujasaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 15.1]
samutpetur mahāvegā hutāśasamatejasaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 15.2]
rathaiśca mattair nāgaiśca vājibhiśca mahājavaiḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 16.1]
śastraiśca vividhaistīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiścopacitā balaiḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 16.2]
tatastaṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim | [Rām, Su, 44 17.1]
raśmimantam ivodyantaṃ svatejoraśmimālinam | [Rām, Su, 44 17.2]
toraṇasthaṃ mahāvegaṃ mahāsattvaṃ mahābalam | [Rām, Su, 44 18.1]
mahāmatiṃ mahotsāhaṃ mahākāyaṃ mahābalam | [Rām, Su, 44 18.2]
taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsvavasthitāḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 19.1]
taistaiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetustatastataḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 19.2]
tasya pañcāyasāstīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 20.1]
śirasyutpalapatrābhā durdhareṇa nipātitāḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 20.2]
sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 21.1]
utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan | [Rām, Su, 44 21.2]
tatastu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 22.1]
kirañ śaraśatair naikair abhipede mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 22.2]
sa kapir vārayāmāsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam | [Rām, Su, 44 23.1]
vṛṣṭimantaṃ payodānte payodam iva mārutaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 23.2]

abhavad vānaraḥ kruddho bālasūryasamaprabhaḥ | [Rām, Su, 44 34.2]

{Rām, Su, 45}
senāpatīn pañca sa tu pramāpitān hanūmatā sānucarān savāhanān | [Rām, Su, 45 1.1]
samīkṣya rājā samaroddhatonmukhaṃ kumāram akṣaṃ prasamaikṣatākṣatam | [Rām, Su, 45 1.2]
sa tasya dṛṣṭyarpaṇasampracoditaḥ pratāpavān kāñcanacitrakārmukaḥ | [Rām, Su, 45 2.1]
samutpapātātha sadasyudīrito dvijātimukhyair haviṣeva pāvakaḥ | [Rām, Su, 45 2.2]
tato mahadbāladivākaraprabhaṃ prataptajāmbūnadajālasaṃtatam | [Rām, Su, 45 3.1]
rathaṃ samāsthāya yayau sa vīryavān mahāhariṃ taṃ prati nairṛtarṣabhaḥ | [Rām, Su, 45 3.2]
tatastapaḥsaṃgrahasaṃcayārjitaṃ prataptajāmbūnadajālaśobhitam | [Rām, Su, 45 4.1]
patākinaṃ ratnavibhūṣitadhvajaṃ manojavāṣṭāśvavaraiḥ suyojitam | [Rām, Su, 45 4.2]
surāsurādhṛṣyam asaṃgacāriṇaṃ raviprabhaṃ vyomacaraṃ samāhitam | [Rām, Su, 45 5.1]
satūṇam aṣṭāsinibaddhabandhuraṃ yathākramāveśitaśaktitomaram | [Rām, Su, 45 5.2]
virājamānaṃ pratipūrṇavastunā sahemadāmnā śaśisūryavarcasā | [Rām, Su, 45 6.1]
divākarābhaṃ ratham āsthitastataḥ sa nirjagāmāmaratulyavikramaḥ | [Rām, Su, 45 6.2]
sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ turaṃgamataṅgamahārathasvanaiḥ | [Rām, Su, 45 7.1]
balaiḥ sametaiḥ sa hi toraṇasthitaṃ samartham āsīnam upāgamat kapim | [Rām, Su, 45 7.2]
sa taṃ samāsādya hariṃ harīkṣaṇo yugāntakālāgnim iva prajākṣaye | [Rām, Su, 45 8.1]
avasthitaṃ vismitajātasaṃbhramaḥ samaikṣatākṣo bahumānacakṣuṣā | [Rām, Su, 45 8.2]

{Rām, Su, 47}

{Rām, Su, 48}
tam udvīkṣya mahābāhuḥ piṅgākṣaṃ purataḥ sthitam | [Rām, Su, 48 1.1]

{Rām, Su, 49}
taṃ samīkṣya mahāsattvaṃ sattvavān harisattamaḥ | [Rām, Su, 49 1.1]

mūlaghātiṣu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥ | [Rām, Su, 49 16.2]
kaśca lakṣmaṇamuktānāṃ rāmakopānuvartinām | [Rām, Su, 49 17.1]

manyasva naradevāya jānakī pratidīyatām | [Rām, Su, 49 19.2]

{Rām, Su, 50}
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vānarasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Su, 50 1.1]
ājñāpayad vadhaṃ tasya rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ | [Rām, Su, 50 1.2]

bhavān sendreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati | [Rām, Su, 50 13.2]

{Rām, Su, 51}
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvo mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Su, 51 1.1]

{Rām, Su, 60}

{Rām, Su, 61}

{Rām, Su, 64}

{Rām, Yu, 18}

{Rām, Yu, 32}

{Rām, Yu, 34}
yudhyatām eva teṣāṃ tu tadā vānararakṣasām | [Rām, Yu, 34 1.1]

{Rām, Yu, 37}

{Rām, Yu, 56}

maharṣayo vedavido rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan | [Rām, Utt, 1 12.2]

tvāṃ tu diṣṭyā kuśalinaṃ paśyāmo hataśātravam | [Rām, Utt, 1 13.2]
na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 14.1]
sadhanustvaṃ hi lokāṃstrīn vijayethā na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 14.2]
diṣṭyā tvayā hato rāma rāvaṇaḥ putrapautravān | [Rām, Utt, 1 15.1]
diṣṭyā vijayinaṃ tvādya paśyāmaḥ saha bhāryayā | [Rām, Utt, 1 15.2]
diṣṭyā prahasto vikaṭo virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 16.1]
akampanaśca durdharṣo nihatāste niśācarāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 16.2]
yasya pramāṇād vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate | [Rām, Utt, 1 17.1]
diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇo nipātitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 17.2]
diṣṭyā tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa dvandvayuddham upāgataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 18.1]
devatānām avadhyena vijayaṃ prāptavān asi | [Rām, Utt, 1 18.2]
saṃkhye tasya na kiṃcit tu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 19.1]
dvandvayuddham anuprāpto diṣṭyā te rāvaṇir hataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 19.2]
diṣṭyā tasya mahābāho kālasyevābhidhāvataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 20.1]
muktaḥ suraripor vīra prāptaśca vijayastvayā | [Rām, Utt, 1 20.2]
vismayastveṣa naḥ saumya saṃśrutyendrajitaṃ hatam | [Rām, Utt, 1 21.1]
avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ mahāmāyādharo yudhi | [Rām, Utt, 1 21.2]
dattvā puṇyām imāṃ vīra saumyām abhayadakṣiṇām | [Rām, Utt, 1 22.1]
diṣṭyā vardhasi kākutstha jayenāmitrakarśana | [Rām, Utt, 1 22.2]
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām | [Rām, Utt, 1 23.1]
vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 1 23.2]
bhavantaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ ca niśācaram | [Rām, Utt, 1 24.1]
atikramya mahāvīryau kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim | [Rām, Utt, 1 24.2]
mahodaraṃ prahastaṃ ca virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ | [Rām, Utt, 1 25.1]
atikramya mahāvīryān kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim | [Rām, Utt, 1 25.2]
kīdṛśo vai prabhāvo 'sya kiṃ balaṃ kaḥ parākramaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 26.1]
kena vā kāraṇenaiṣa rāvaṇād atiricyate | [Rām, Utt, 1 26.2]
śakyaṃ yadi mayā śrotuṃ na khalvājñāpayāmi vaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 27.1]

kathaṃ śakro jitastena kathaṃ labdhavaraśca saḥ | [Rām, Utt, 1 27.3]
{Rām, Utt, 2}
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 1.1]
kumbhayonir mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 2 1.2]
śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yasya tejobalaṃ mahat | [Rām, Utt, 2 2.1]
jaghāna ca ripūn yuddhe yathāvadhyaśca śatrubhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 2.2]
ahaṃ te rāvaṇasyedaṃ kulaṃ janma ca rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 2 3.1]
varapradānaṃ ca tathā tasmai dattaṃ bravīmi te | [Rām, Utt, 2 3.2]
purā kṛtayuge rāma prajāpatisutaḥ prabhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 4.1]
pulastyo nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣād iva pitāmahaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 4.2]
nānukīrtyā guṇāstasya dharmataḥ śīlatastathā | [Rām, Utt, 2 5.1]
prajāpateḥ putra iti vaktuṃ śakyaṃ hi nāmataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 5.2]
sa tu dharmaprasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahāgireḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 6.1]
tṛṇabindvāśramaṃ gatvā nyavasanmunipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 6.2]
tapastepe sa dharmātmā svādhyāyaniyatendriyaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 7.1]
gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vighnaṃ kurvanti kanyakāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 7.2]
devapannagakanyāśca rājarṣitanayāśca yāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 8.1]
krīḍantyo 'psarasaścaiva taṃ deśam upapedire | [Rām, Utt, 2 8.2]
sarvartuṣūpabhogyatvād ramyatvāt kānanasya ca | [Rām, Utt, 2 9.1]
nityaśastāstu taṃ deśaṃ gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 9.2]
atha ruṣṭo mahātejā vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 10.1]
yā me darśanam āgacchet sā garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 2 10.2]
tāstu sarvāḥ pratigatāḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 11.1]
brahmaśāpabhayād bhītāstaṃ deśaṃ nopacakramuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 11.2]
tṛṇabindostu rājarṣestanayā na śṛṇoti tat | [Rām, Utt, 2 12.1]
gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vicacāra sunirbhayā | [Rām, Utt, 2 12.2]
tasminn eva tu kāle sa prājāpatyo mahān ṛṣiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 13.1]
svādhyāyam akarot tatra tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 13.2]
sā tu vedadhvaniṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā caiva tapodhanam | [Rām, Utt, 2 14.1]
abhavat pāṇḍudehā sā suvyañjitaśarīrajā | [Rām, Utt, 2 14.2]
dṛṣṭvā paramasaṃvignā sā tu tadrūpam ātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 15.1]
idaṃ me kiṃ nviti jñātvā pitur gatvāgrataḥ sthitā | [Rām, Utt, 2 15.2]
tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtāṃ tṛṇabindur athābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 2 16.1]
kiṃ tvam etat tv asadṛśaṃ dhārayasyātmano vapuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 16.2]
sā tu kṛtvāñjaliṃ dīnā kanyovāca tapodhanam | [Rām, Utt, 2 17.1]
na jāne kāraṇaṃ tāta yena me rūpam īdṛśam | [Rām, Utt, 2 17.2]
kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ gatāsmyekā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 18.1]
pulastyasyāśramaṃ divyam anveṣṭuṃ svasakhījanam | [Rām, Utt, 2 18.2]
na ca paśyāmyahaṃ tatra kāṃcid apyāgatāṃ sakhīm | [Rām, Utt, 2 19.1]
rūpasya tu viparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāham ihāgatā | [Rām, Utt, 2 19.2]
tṛṇabindustu rājarṣistapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 20.1]
dhyānaṃ viveśa taccāpi apaśyad ṛṣikarmajam | [Rām, Utt, 2 20.2]
sa tu vijñāya taṃ śāpaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 21.1]
gṛhītvā tanayāṃ gatvā pulastyam idam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 2 21.2]
bhagavaṃstanayāṃ me tvaṃ guṇaiḥ svair eva bhūṣitām | [Rām, Utt, 2 22.1]
bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhāṇemāṃ maharṣe svayam udyatām | [Rām, Utt, 2 22.2]
tapaścaraṇayuktasya śrāmyamāṇendriyasya te | [Rām, Utt, 2 23.1]
śuśrūṣātatparā nityaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 23.2]
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājarṣiṃ dhārmikaṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 2 24.1]
jighṛkṣur abravīt kanyāṃ bāḍham ityeva sa dvijaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 24.2]
dattvā tu sa gato rājā svam āśramapadaṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 2 25.1]
sāpi tatrāvasat kanyā toṣayantī patiṃ guṇaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 25.2]
prītaḥ sa tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 2 25.3]
parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te guṇānāṃ saṃpadā bhṛśam | [Rām, Utt, 2 26.1]
tasmāt te viramāmyadya putram ātmasamaṃ guṇaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 26.2]
ubhayor vaṃśakartāraṃ paulastya iti viśrutam | [Rām, Utt, 2 26.3]
yasmāt tu viśruto vedastvayehābhyasyato mama | [Rām, Utt, 2 27.1]
tasmāt sa viśravā nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 27.2]
evam uktā tu sā kanyā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 2 28.1]
acireṇaiva kālena sūtā viśravasaṃ sutam | [Rām, Utt, 2 28.2]
sa tu lokatraye khyātaḥ śaucadharmasamanvitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 29.1]
piteva tapasā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 2 29.2]
{Rām, Utt, 3}
atha putraḥ pulastyasya viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 1.1]
acireṇaiva kālena piteva tapasi sthitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 1.2]
satyavāñ śīlavān dakṣaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 2.1]
sarvabhogeṣvasaṃsakto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 2.2]
jñātvā tasya tu tadvṛttaṃ bharadvājo mahān ṛṣiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 3.1]
dadau viśravase bhāryāṃ svāṃ sutāṃ devavarṇinīm | [Rām, Utt, 3 3.2]
pratigṛhya tu dharmeṇa bharadvājasutāṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 3 4.1]
mudā paramayā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 4.2]
sa tasyāṃ vīryasampannam apatyaṃ paramādbhutam | [Rām, Utt, 3 5.1]
janayāmāsa dharmātmā sarvair brahmaguṇair yutam | [Rām, Utt, 3 5.2]
tasmiñ jāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa babhūva pitāmahaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 6.1]
nāma cāsyākarot prītaḥ sārdhaṃ devarṣibhistadā | [Rām, Utt, 3 6.2]
yasmād viśravaso 'patyaṃ sādṛśyād viśravā iva | [Rām, Utt, 3 7.1]
tasmād vaiśravaṇo nāma bhaviṣyatyeṣa viśrutaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 7.2]
sa tu vaiśravaṇastatra tapovanagatastadā | [Rām, Utt, 3 8.1]
avardhata mahātejā hutāhutir ivānalaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 8.2]
tasyāśramapadasthasya buddhir jajñe mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 9.1]
cariṣye niyato dharmaṃ dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 9.2]
sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapastaptvā mahāvane | [Rām, Utt, 3 10.1]
pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu taṃ taṃ vidhim avartata | [Rām, Utt, 3 10.2]
jalāśī mārutāhāro nirāhārastathaiva ca | [Rām, Utt, 3 11.1]
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi jagmustānyeva varṣavat | [Rām, Utt, 3 11.2]
atha prīto mahātejāḥ sendraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha | [Rām, Utt, 3 12.1]
gatvā tasyāśramapadaṃ brahmedaṃ vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 3 12.2]
parituṣṭo 'smi te vatsa karmaṇānena suvrata | [Rām, Utt, 3 13.1]
varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te varārhastvaṃ hi me mataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 13.2]
athābravīd vaiśravaṇaḥ pitāmaham upasthitam | [Rām, Utt, 3 14.1]
bhagavaṃllokapālatvam iccheyaṃ vittarakṣaṇam | [Rām, Utt, 3 14.2]
tato 'bravīd vaiśravaṇaṃ parituṣṭena cetasā | [Rām, Utt, 3 15.1]
brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bāḍham ityeva hṛṣṭavat | [Rām, Utt, 3 15.2]
ahaṃ hi lokapālānāṃ caturthaṃ sraṣṭum udyataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 16.1]
yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi padaṃ yat tava cepsitam | [Rām, Utt, 3 16.2]
tatkṛtaṃ gaccha dharmajña dhaneśatvam avāpnuhi | [Rām, Utt, 3 17.1]
yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi caturtho 'dya bhaviṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 3 17.2]
etacca puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham | [Rām, Utt, 3 18.1]
pratigṛhṇīṣva yānārthaṃ tridaśaiḥ samatāṃ vraja | [Rām, Utt, 3 18.2]
svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarva eva yathāgatam | [Rām, Utt, 3 19.1]
kṛtakṛtyā vayaṃ tāta dattvā tava mahāvaram | [Rām, Utt, 3 19.2]
gateṣu brahmapūrveṣu deveṣvatha nabhastalam | [Rām, Utt, 3 20.1]
dhaneśaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vinayāt praṇato vacaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 20.2]
bhagavaṃllabdhavān asmi varaṃ kamalayonitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 21.1]
nivāsaṃ na tu me devo vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 21.2]
tat paśya bhagavan kaṃcid deśaṃ vāsāya naḥ prabho | [Rām, Utt, 3 22.1]
na ca pīḍā bhaved yatra prāṇino yasya kasyacit | [Rām, Utt, 3 22.2]
evam uktastu putreṇa viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 23.1]
vacanaṃ prāha dharmajña śrūyatām iti dharmavit | [Rām, Utt, 3 23.2]
laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā | [Rām, Utt, 3 24.1]
rākṣasānāṃ nivāsārthaṃ yathendrasyāmarāvatī | [Rām, Utt, 3 24.2]
ramaṇīyā purī sā hi rukmavaidūryatoraṇā | [Rām, Utt, 3 25.1]
rākṣasaiḥ sā parityaktā purā viṣṇubhayārditaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 25.2]
śūnyā rakṣogaṇaiḥ sarvai rasātalatalaṃ gataiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 25.3]
sa tvaṃ tatra nivāsāya rocayasva matiṃ svakām | [Rām, Utt, 3 26.1]
nirdoṣastatra te vāso na ca bādhāsti kasyacit | [Rām, Utt, 3 26.2]
etacchrutvā tu dharmātmā dharmiṣṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 27.1]
niveśayāmāsa tadā laṅkāṃ parvatamūrdhani | [Rām, Utt, 3 27.2]
nairṛtānāṃ sahasraistu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramuditaiḥ sadā | [Rām, Utt, 3 28.1]
acireṇaikakālena sampūrṇā tasya śāsanāt | [Rām, Utt, 3 28.2]
atha tatrāvasat prīto dharmātmā nairṛtādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 29.1]
samudraparidhānāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ viśravātmajaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 29.2]
kāle kāle vinītātmā puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 30.1]
abhyagacchat susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 30.2]
sa devagandharvagaṇair abhiṣṭutas tathaiva siddhaiḥ saha cāraṇair api | [Rām, Utt, 3 31.1]
gabhastibhiḥ sūrya ivaujasā vṛtaḥ pituḥ samīpaṃ prayayau śriyā vṛtaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 3 31.2]
{Rām, Utt, 4}
śrutvāgastyeritaṃ vākyaṃ rāmo vismayam āgataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 1.1]
pūrvam āsīt tu laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasām iti saṃbhavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 1.2]
tataḥ śiraḥ kampayitvā tretāgnisamavigraham | [Rām, Utt, 4 2.1]
agastyaṃ taṃ muhur dṛṣṭvā smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata | [Rām, Utt, 4 2.2]
bhagavan pūrvam apyeṣā laṅkāsīt piśitāśinām | [Rām, Utt, 4 3.1]
itīdaṃ bhavataḥ śrutvā vismayo janito mama | [Rām, Utt, 4 3.2]
pulastyavaṃśād udbhūtā rākṣasā iti naḥ śrutam | [Rām, Utt, 4 4.1]
idānīm anyataścāpi saṃbhavaḥ kīrtitastvayā | [Rām, Utt, 4 4.2]
rāvaṇāt kumbhakarṇācca prahastād vikaṭād api | [Rām, Utt, 4 5.1]
rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kiṃ nu te balavattarāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 5.2]
ka eṣāṃ pūrvako brahman kiṃnāmā kiṃtapobalaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 6.1]
aparādhaṃ ca kaṃ prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ purā | [Rām, Utt, 4 6.2]
etad vistarataḥ sarvaṃ kathayasva mamānagha | [Rām, Utt, 4 7.1]
kautūhalaṃ kṛtaṃ mahyaṃ nuda bhānur yathā tamaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 7.2]
rāghavasya tu tacchrutvā saṃskārālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 8.1]
īṣadvismayamānastam agastyaḥ prāha rāghavam | [Rām, Utt, 4 8.2]
prajāpatiḥ purā sṛṣṭvā apaḥ salilasaṃbhavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 9.1]
tāsāṃ gopāyane sattvān asṛjat padmasaṃbhavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 9.2]
te sattvāḥ sattvakartāraṃ vinītavad upasthitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 10.1]
kiṃ kurma iti bhāṣantaḥ kṣutpipāsābhayārditāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 10.2]
prajāpatistu tānyāha sattvāni prahasann iva | [Rām, Utt, 4 11.1]
ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvam iti mānadaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 11.2]
rakṣāma iti tatrānyair yakṣāmeti tathāparaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 12.1]
bhuṅkṣitābhuṅkṣitair uktastatastān āha bhūtakṛt | [Rām, Utt, 4 12.2]
rakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ rākṣasāste bhavantu vaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 13.1]
yakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ te vai yakṣā bhavantu vaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 13.2]
tatra hetiḥ prahetiśca bhrātarau rākṣasarṣabhau | [Rām, Utt, 4 14.1]
madhukaiṭabhasaṃkāśau babhūvatur ariṃdamau | [Rām, Utt, 4 14.2]
prahetir dhārmikastatra na dārān so 'bhikāṅkṣati | [Rām, Utt, 4 15.1]
hetir dārakriyārthaṃ tu yatnaṃ param athākarot | [Rām, Utt, 4 15.2]
sa kālabhaginīṃ kanyāṃ bhayāṃ nāma bhayāvahām | [Rām, Utt, 4 16.1]
udāvahad ameyātmā svayam eva mahāmatiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 16.2]
sa tasyāṃ janayāmāsa hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 17.1]
putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vidyutkeśa iti śrutam | [Rām, Utt, 4 17.2]
vidyutkeśo hetiputraḥ pradīptāgnisamaprabhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 18.1]
vyavardhata mahātejāstoyamadhya ivāmbujam | [Rām, Utt, 4 18.2]
sa yadā yauvanaṃ bhadram anuprāpto niśācaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 19.1]
tato dārakriyāṃ tasya kartuṃ vyavasitaḥ pitā | [Rām, Utt, 4 19.2]
saṃdhyāduhitaraṃ so 'tha saṃdhyātulyāṃ prabhāvataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 20.1]
varayāmāsa putrārthaṃ hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 20.2]
avaśyam eva dātavyā parasmai seti saṃdhyayā | [Rām, Utt, 4 21.1]
cintayitvā sutā dattā vidyutkeśāya rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 4 21.2]
saṃdhyāyāstanayāṃ labdhvā vidyutkeśo niśācaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 4 22.1]
ramate sa tayā sārdhaṃ paulomyā maghavān iva | [Rām, Utt, 4 22.2]
kenacit tvatha kālena rāma sālakaṭaṃkaṭā | [Rām, Utt, 4 23.1]

{Rām, Utt, 11}
sumālī varalabdhāṃstu jñātvā tān vai niśācarān | [Rām, Utt, 11 1.1]

mārīcaśca prahastaśca virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 11 2.1]

abhigamya daśagrīvaṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 11 3.2]

{Rām, Utt, 12}
rākṣasendro 'bhiṣiktastu bhrātṛbhyāṃ sahitastadā | [Rām, Utt, 12 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 13}

{Rām, Utt, 14}
tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍbhir nityaṃ balotkaṭaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 14 1.1]

etasminn antare rāma vistīrṇabalavāhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 14 18.1]

taṃ yakṣaṃ yodhayāmāsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve | [Rām, Utt, 14 20.2]
tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ vaidūryarajatokṣitam | [Rām, Utt, 14 21.1]
maryādāṃ dvārapālānāṃ toraṇaṃ tat samāviśat | [Rām, Utt, 14 21.2]

{Rām, Utt, 15}
tatastān vidrutān dṛṣṭvā yakṣāñśatasahasraśaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 15 1.1]

sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye śāpād vibhraṣṭagauravam | [Rām, Utt, 15 13.1]
uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān yuktaṃ paitāmahe kule | [Rām, Utt, 15 13.2]
mayā tvaṃ vāryamāṇo 'pi nāvagacchasi durmate | [Rām, Utt, 15 14.1]

yo hi mohād viṣaṃ pītvā nāvagacchati mānavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 15 15.1]
pariṇāme sa vimūḍho jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam | [Rām, Utt, 15 15.2]
daivatāni hi nandanti dharmayuktena kenacit | [Rām, Utt, 15 16.1]
yena tvam īdṛśaṃ bhāvaṃ nītastacca na budhyase | [Rām, Utt, 15 16.2]
yo hi mātṝḥ pitṝn bhrātṝn ācāryāṃścāvamanyate | [Rām, Utt, 15 17.1]

evaṃ nirayagāmī tvaṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī | [Rām, Utt, 15 21.1]

evam uktvā tatastena tasyāmātyāḥ samāhatāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 15 22.1]
mārīcapramukhāḥ sarve vimukhā vipradudruvuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 15 22.2]
tatastena daśagrīvo yakṣendreṇa mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 15 23.1]

evaṃ sa tenābhihato vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 15 27.1]

jitvā vaiśravaṇaṃ devaṃ kailāsād avarohata | [Rām, Utt, 15 31.2]
{Rām, Utt, 16}
sa jitvā bhrātaraṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 16 1.1]

athāpaśyad daśagrīvo raukmaṃ śaravaṇaṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 16 2.1]

parvataṃ sa samāsādya kiṃcid ramyavanāntaram | [Rām, Utt, 16 3.1]

na hantavyo hatastvaṃ hi pūrvam eva svakarmabhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 16 16.2]
acintayitvā sa tadā nandivākyaṃ niśācaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 16 17.1]
parvataṃ taṃ samāsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 16 17.2]

{Rām, Utt, 17}
atha rājanmahābāhur vicaran sa mahītalam | [Rām, Utt, 17 1.1]
himavadvanam āsādya paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 17 1.2]
tatrāpaśyata vai kanyāṃ kṛṣṇājinajaṭādharām | [Rām, Utt, 17 2.1]

kāmamohaparītātmā papraccha prahasann iva | [Rām, Utt, 17 3.2]

karomīti mamecchā ca hṛdaye sādhu viṣṭhitā | [Rām, Utt, 17 14.2]

{Rām, Utt, 18}
praviṣṭāyāṃ hutāśaṃ tu vedavatyāṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 1.1]

tato marutto nṛpatistaṃ rākṣasam athābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 18 10.1]
dhanyaḥ khalu bhavān yena jyeṣṭho bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 10.2]
nādharmasahitaṃ ślāghyaṃ na lokapratisaṃhitam | [Rām, Utt, 18 11.1]

kiṃ tvaṃ prāk kevalaṃ dharmaṃ caritvā labdhavān varam | [Rām, Utt, 18 12.1]
śrutapūrvaṃ hi na mayā yādṛśaṃ bhāṣase svayam | [Rām, Utt, 18 12.2]
tataḥ śarāsanaṃ gṛhya sāyakāṃśca sa pārthivaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 13.1]

śrotavyaṃ yadi madvākyaṃ saṃprahāro na te kṣamaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 14.2]
māheśvaram idaṃ satram asamāptaṃ kulaṃ dahet | [Rām, Utt, 18 15.1]
dīkṣitasya kuto yuddhaṃ krūratvaṃ dīkṣite kutaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 15.2]
saṃśayaśca raṇe nityaṃ rākṣasaścaiṣa durjayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 16.1]
sa nivṛtto guror vākyānmaruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 16.2]
visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ svastho makhamukho 'bhavat | [Rām, Utt, 18 16.3]
tatastaṃ nirjitaṃ matvā ghoṣayāmāsa vai śukaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 18 17.1]

varṣamāṇe mayi mudaṃ prāpsyase prītilakṣaṇam | [Rām, Utt, 18 21.2]

surādhipād varaṃ prāpya gatāḥ sarve vicitratām | [Rām, Utt, 18 22.2]

varuṇastvabravīddhaṃsaṃ gaṅgātoyavicāriṇam | [Rām, Utt, 18 27.1]

eṣa kāñcanako varṇo matprītyā te bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 18 32.2]

{Rām, Utt, 19}
atha jitvā maruttaṃ sa prayayau rākṣasādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 19 1.1]

taṃ prahasyābravīd rakṣa ikṣvākuṃ pṛthivīpatim | [Rām, Utt, 19 18.1]

musalāni śilāvṛkṣānmumocāstrabalād balī | [Rām, Utt, 21 21.2]

{Rām, Utt, 22}

{Rām, Utt, 23}
sa tu jitvā daśagrīvo yamaṃ tridaśapuṃgavam | [Rām, Utt, 23 1.1]
rāvaṇastu jayaślāghī svasahāyān dadarśa ha | [Rām, Utt, 23 1.2]
jayena vardhayitvā ca mārīcapramukhāstataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 23 2.1]

salilendrapurānveṣī sa babhrāma rasātalam | [Rām, Utt, 23 14.2]
tato 'śmanagaraṃ nāma kālakeyābhirakṣitam | [Rām, Utt, 23 15.1]

mumocāśu mahānādaṃ virathān prekṣya tān sthitān | [Rām, Utt, 23 33.2]

te tu tyaktvā rathān putrā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 23 35.1]
ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ svaprabhāvānna vivyathuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 23 35.2]
dhanūṃṣi kṛtvā sajyāni vinirbhidya mahodaram | [Rām, Utt, 23 36.1]
rāvaṇaṃ samare kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ samabhidravan | [Rām, Utt, 23 36.2]
tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ kālāgnir iva viṣṭhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 23 37.1]
śaravarṣaṃ mahāvegaṃ teṣāṃ marmasvapātayat | [Rām, Utt, 23 37.2]
musalāni vicitrāṇi tato bhallaśatāni ca | [Rām, Utt, 23 38.1]

{Rām, Utt, 24}

{Rām, Utt, 25}

{Rām, Utt, 26}

{Rām, Utt, 28}
sumālinaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā vasunā bhasmasātkṛtam | [Rām, Utt, 28 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 29}
tatastamasi saṃjāte rākṣasā daivataiḥ saha | [Rām, Utt, 29 1.1]

ayudhyata mahātejā rākṣasānnāśayan raṇe | [Rām, Utt, 29 17.2]

{Rām, Utt, 30}
jite mahendre 'tibale rāvaṇasya sutena vai | [Rām, Utt, 30 1.1]
prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya gatā laṅkāṃ surāstadā | [Rām, Utt, 30 1.2]

tataḥ kruddhena tenāsi śaptaḥ paramatejasā | [Rām, Utt, 30 28.1]
gato 'si yena devendra daśābhāgaviparyayam | [Rām, Utt, 30 28.2]
yasmānme dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam | [Rām, Utt, 30 29.1]
tasmāt tvaṃ samare rājañśatruhastaṃ gamiṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 30 29.2]
ayaṃ tu bhāvo durbuddhe yastvayeha pravartitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 30.1]
mānuṣeṣvapi sarveṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 30.2]
tatrādharmaḥ subalavān samutthāsyati yo mahān | [Rām, Utt, 30 31.1]
tatrārdhaṃ tasya yaḥ kartā tvayyardhaṃ nipatiṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 30 31.2]
na ca te sthāvaraṃ sthānaṃ bhaviṣyati puraṃdara | [Rām, Utt, 30 32.1]
etenādharmayogena yastvayeha pravartitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 32.2]
yaśca yaśca surendraḥ syād dhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 30 33.1]
eṣa śāpo mayā mukta ityasau tvāṃ tadābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 30 33.2]
tāṃ tu bhāryāṃ vinirbhartsya so 'bravīt sumahātapāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 34.1]
durvinīte vinidhvaṃsa mamāśramasamīpataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 34.2]
rūpayauvanasampannā yasmāt tvam anavasthitā | [Rām, Utt, 30 35.1]
tasmād rūpavatī loke na tvam ekā bhaviṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 30 35.2]
rūpaṃ ca tat prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti sudurlabham | [Rām, Utt, 30 36.1]
yat tavedaṃ samāśritya vibhrame 'yam upasthitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 36.2]
tadā prabhṛti bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prajā rūpasamanvitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 37.1]
śāpotsargāddhi tasyedaṃ muneḥ sarvam upāgatam | [Rām, Utt, 30 37.2]
tat smara tvaṃ mahābāho duṣkṛtaṃ yat tvayā kṛtam | [Rām, Utt, 30 38.1]
yena tvaṃ grahaṇaṃ śatror gato nānyena vāsava | [Rām, Utt, 30 38.2]
śīghraṃ yajasva yajñaṃ tvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ susamāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 39.1]
pāvitastena yajñena yāsyasi tridivaṃ tataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 39.2]
putraśca tava devendra na vinaṣṭo mahāraṇe | [Rām, Utt, 30 40.1]
nītaḥ saṃnihitaścaiva aryakeṇa mahodadhau | [Rām, Utt, 30 40.2]
etacchrutvā mahendrastu yajñam iṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam | [Rām, Utt, 30 41.1]
punastridivam ākrāmad anvaśāsacca devatāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 41.2]
etad indrajito rāma balaṃ yat kīrtitaṃ mayā | [Rām, Utt, 30 42.1]
nirjitastena devendraḥ prāṇino 'nye ca kiṃ punaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 30 42.2]
{Rām, Utt, 31}
tato rāmo mahātejā vismayāt punar eva hi | [Rām, Utt, 31 1.1]
uvāca praṇato vākyam agastyam ṛṣisattamam | [Rām, Utt, 31 1.2]
bhagavan kiṃ tadā lokāḥ śūnyā āsan dvijottama | [Rām, Utt, 31 2.1]
dharṣaṇāṃ yatra na prāpto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 2.2]

bahiṣkṛtā varāstraiśca bahavo nirjitā nṛpāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 3.2]

abruvan rākṣasapatim asāṃnidhyaṃ mahīpateḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 11.2]

apasṛtyāgato vindhyaṃ himavatsaṃnibhaṃ girim | [Rām, Utt, 31 12.2]
sa tam abhram ivāviṣṭam udbhrāntam iva medinīm | [Rām, Utt, 31 13.1]
apaśyad rāvaṇo vindhyam ālikhantam ivāmbaram | [Rām, Utt, 31 13.2]
sahasraśikharopetaṃ siṃhādhyuṣitakandaram | [Rām, Utt, 31 14.1]
prapātapatitaiḥ śītaiḥ sāṭṭahāsam ivāmbubhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 14.2]
devadānavagandharvaiḥ sāpsarogaṇakiṃnaraiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 15.1]
saha strībhiḥ krīḍamānaiḥ svargabhūtaṃ mahocchrayam | [Rām, Utt, 31 15.2]
nadībhiḥ syandamānābhir agatipratimaṃ jalam | [Rām, Utt, 31 16.1]
sphuṭībhiścalajihvābhir vamantam iva viṣṭhitam | [Rām, Utt, 31 16.2]
ulkāvantaṃ darīvantaṃ himavatsaṃnibhaṃ girim | [Rām, Utt, 31 17.1]
paśyamānastato vindhyaṃ rāvaṇo narmadāṃ yayau | [Rām, Utt, 31 17.2]
calopalajalāṃ puṇyāṃ paścimodadhigāminīm | [Rām, Utt, 31 18.1]
mahiṣaiḥ sṛmaraiḥ siṃhaiḥ śārdūlarkṣagajottamaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 18.2]
uṣṇābhitaptaistṛṣitaiḥ saṃkṣobhitajalāśayām | [Rām, Utt, 31 18.3]
cakravākaiḥ sakāraṇḍaiḥ sahaṃsajalakukkuṭaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 19.1]
sārasaiśca sadāmattaiḥ kokūjadbhiḥ samāvṛtām | [Rām, Utt, 31 19.2]
phulladrumakṛtottaṃsāṃ cakravākayugastanīm | [Rām, Utt, 31 20.1]
vistīrṇapulinaśroṇīṃ haṃsāvalisumekhalām | [Rām, Utt, 31 20.2]
puṣpareṇvanuliptāṅgīṃ jalaphenāmalāṃśukām | [Rām, Utt, 31 21.1]
jalāvagāhasaṃsparśāṃ phullotpalaśubhekṣaṇām | [Rām, Utt, 31 21.2]
puṣpakād avaruhyāśu narmadāṃ saritāṃ varām | [Rām, Utt, 31 22.1]
iṣṭām iva varāṃ nārīm avagāhya daśānanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 22.2]
sa tasyāḥ puline ramye nānākusumaśobhite | [Rām, Utt, 31 23.1]
upopaviṣṭaḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 23.2]

tataḥ salīlaṃ prahasan rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 24.1]
uvāca sacivāṃstatra mārīcaśukasāraṇān | [Rām, Utt, 31 24.2]
eṣa raśmisahasreṇa jagat kṛtveva kāñcanam | [Rām, Utt, 31 25.1]

narmadājalaśītaśca sugandhiḥ śramanāśanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 26.1]
madbhayād anilo hyeṣa vātyasau susamāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 26.2]
iyaṃ cāpi saricchreṣṭhā narmadā narmavardhinī | [Rām, Utt, 31 27.1]
līnamīnavihaṃgormiḥ sabhayevāṅganā sthitā | [Rām, Utt, 31 27.2]

candanasya raseneva rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 28.2]
te yūyam avagāhadhvaṃ narmadāṃ śarmadāṃ nṛṇām | [Rām, Utt, 31 29.1]
mahāpadmamukhā mattā gaṅgām iva mahāgajāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 29.2]
asyāṃ snātvā mahānadyāṃ pāpmānaṃ vipramokṣyatha | [Rām, Utt, 31 30.1]
aham apyatra puline śaradindusamaprabhe | [Rām, Utt, 31 31.1]
puṣpopahāraṃ śanakaiḥ kariṣyāmi umāpateḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 31.2]
rāvaṇenaivam uktāstu mārīcaśukasāraṇāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 32.1]
samahodaradhūmrākṣā narmadām avagāhire | [Rām, Utt, 31 32.2]
rākṣasendragajaistaistu kṣobhyate narmadā nadī | [Rām, Utt, 31 33.1]
vāmanāñjanapadmādyair gaṅgā iva mahāgajaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 33.2]
tataste rākṣasāḥ snātvā narmadāyā varāmbhasi | [Rām, Utt, 31 34.1]
uttīrya puṣpāṇyājahrur balyarthaṃ rāvaṇasya tu | [Rām, Utt, 31 34.2]
narmadāpuline ramye śubhrābhrasadṛśaprabhe | [Rām, Utt, 31 35.1]
rākṣasendrair muhūrtena kṛtaḥ puṣpamayo giriḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 35.2]
puṣpeṣūpahṛteṣveva rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 31 36.1]

{Rām, Utt, 32}
narmadāpuline yatra rākṣasendraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 1.1]
puṣpopahāraṃ kurute tasmād deśād adūrataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 1.2]
arjuno jayatāṃ śreṣṭho māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 2.1]
krīḍate saha nārībhir narmadātoyam āśritaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 2.2]
tāsāṃ madhyagato rājā rarāja sa tato 'rjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 3.1]
kareṇūnāṃ sahasrasya madhyastha iva kuñjaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 3.2]
jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnāṃ sahasrasyottamaṃ balam | [Rām, Utt, 32 4.1]
rurodha narmadāvegaṃ bāhubhiḥ sa tadārjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 4.2]
kārtavīryabhujāsetuṃ tajjalaṃ prāpya nirmalam | [Rām, Utt, 32 5.1]
kūlāpahāraṃ kurvāṇaṃ pratisrotaḥ pradhāvati | [Rām, Utt, 32 5.2]
samīnanakramakaraḥ sapuṣpakuśasaṃstaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 6.1]
sa narmadāmbhaso vegaḥ prāvṛṭkāla ivābabhau | [Rām, Utt, 32 6.2]
sa vegaḥ kārtavīryeṇa saṃpreṣita ivāmbhasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 7.1]
puṣpopahāraṃ tat sarvaṃ rāvaṇasya jahāra ha | [Rām, Utt, 32 7.2]
rāvaṇo 'rdhasamāptaṃ tu utsṛjya niyamaṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 32 8.1]
narmadāṃ paśyate kāntāṃ pratikūlāṃ yathā priyām | [Rām, Utt, 32 8.2]
paścimena tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarodgārasaṃnibham | [Rām, Utt, 32 9.1]
vardhantam ambhaso vegaṃ pūrvām āśāṃ praviśya tu | [Rām, Utt, 32 9.2]
tato 'nudbhrāntaśakunāṃ svābhāvye parame sthitām | [Rām, Utt, 32 10.1]
nirvikārāṅganābhāsāṃ paśyate rāvaṇo nadīm | [Rām, Utt, 32 10.2]
savyetarakarāṅgulyā saśabdaṃ ca daśānanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 11.1]
vegaprabhavam anveṣṭuṃ so 'diśacchukasāraṇau | [Rām, Utt, 32 11.2]
tau tu rāvaṇasaṃdiṣṭau bhrātarau śukasāraṇau | [Rām, Utt, 32 12.1]
vyomāntaracarau vīrau prasthitau paścimonmukhau | [Rām, Utt, 32 12.2]
ardhayojanamātraṃ tu gatvā tau tu niśācarau | [Rām, Utt, 32 13.1]
paśyetāṃ puruṣaṃ toye krīḍantaṃ sahayoṣitam | [Rām, Utt, 32 13.2]
bṛhatsālapratīkāśaṃ toyavyākulamūrdhajam | [Rām, Utt, 32 14.1]
madaraktāntanayanaṃ madanākāravarcasaṃ | [Rām, Utt, 32 14.2]
nadīṃ bāhusahasreṇa rundhantam arimardanam | [Rām, Utt, 32 15.1]
giriṃ pādasahasreṇa rundhantam iva medinīm | [Rām, Utt, 32 15.2]
bālānāṃ varanārīṇāṃ sahasreṇābhisaṃvṛtam | [Rām, Utt, 32 16.1]
samadānāṃ kareṇūnāṃ sahasreṇeva kuñjaram | [Rām, Utt, 32 16.2]
tam adbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasau śukasāraṇau | [Rām, Utt, 32 17.1]
saṃnivṛttāvupāgamya rāvaṇaṃ tam athocatuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 17.2]
bṛhatsālapratīkāśaḥ ko 'pyasau rākṣaseśvara | [Rām, Utt, 32 18.1]
narmadāṃ rodhavad ruddhvā krīḍāpayati yoṣitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 18.2]
tena bāhusahasreṇa saṃniruddhajalā nadī | [Rām, Utt, 32 19.1]
sāgarodgārasaṃkāśān udgārān sṛjate muhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 19.2]
ityevaṃ bhāṣamāṇau tau niśamya śukasāraṇau | [Rām, Utt, 32 20.1]
rāvaṇo 'rjuna ityuktvā uttasthau yuddhalālasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 20.2]
arjunābhimukhe tasmin prasthite rākṣaseśvare | [Rām, Utt, 32 21.1]
sakṛd eva kṛto rāvaḥ saraktaḥ preṣito ghanaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 21.2]
mahodaramahāpārśvadhūmrākṣaśukasāraṇaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 22.1]
saṃvṛto rākṣasendrastu tatrāgād yatra so 'rjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 22.2]
nātidīrgheṇa kālena sa tato rākṣaso balī | [Rām, Utt, 32 23.1]
taṃ narmadāhradaṃ bhīmam ājagāmāñjanaprabhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 23.2]
sa tatra strīparivṛtaṃ vāśitābhir iva dvipam | [Rām, Utt, 32 24.1]
narendraṃ paśyate rājā rākṣasānāṃ tadārjunam | [Rām, Utt, 32 24.2]
sa roṣād raktanayano rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 25.1]
ityevam arjunāmātyān āha gambhīrayā girā | [Rām, Utt, 32 25.2]
amātyāḥ kṣipram ākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai | [Rām, Utt, 32 26.1]
yuddhārthaṃ samanuprāpto rāvaṇo nāma nāmataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 26.2]
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mantriṇo 'thārjunasya te | [Rām, Utt, 32 27.1]
uttasthuḥ sāyudhāstaṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abruvan | [Rām, Utt, 32 27.2]
yuddhasya kālo vijñātaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa | [Rām, Utt, 32 28.1]
yaḥ kṣībaṃ strīvṛtaṃ caiva yoddhum icchasi no nṛpam | [Rām, Utt, 32 28.2]
vāśitāmadhyagaṃ mattaṃ śārdūla iva kuñjaram | [Rām, Utt, 32 28.3]
kṣamasvādya daśagrīva uṣyatāṃ rajanī tvayā | [Rām, Utt, 32 29.1]
yuddhaśraddhā tu yadyasti śvastāta samare 'rjunam | [Rām, Utt, 32 29.2]
yadi vāpi tvarā tubhyaṃ yuddhatṛṣṇāsamāvṛtā | [Rām, Utt, 32 30.1]
nihatyāsmāṃstato yuddham arjunenopayāsyasi | [Rām, Utt, 32 30.2]
tataste rāvaṇāmātyair amātyāḥ pārthivasya tu | [Rām, Utt, 32 31.1]
sūditāścāpi te yuddhe bhakṣitāśca bubhukṣitaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 31.2]
tato halahalāśabdo narmadātīra ābabhau | [Rām, Utt, 32 32.1]
arjunasyānuyātrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇām | [Rām, Utt, 32 32.2]
iṣubhistomaraiḥ śūlair vajrakalpaiḥ sakarṣaṇaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 33.1]
sarāvaṇān ardayantaḥ samantāt samabhidrutāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 33.2]
haihayādhipayodhānāṃ vega āsīt sudāruṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 34.1]
sanakramīnamakarasamudrasyeva nisvanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 34.2]
rāvaṇasya tu te 'mātyāḥ prahastaśukasāraṇāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 35.1]
kārtavīryabalaṃ kruddhā nirdahantyagnitejasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 35.2]
arjunāya tu tat karma rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 36.1]
krīḍamānāya kathitaṃ puruṣair dvārarakṣibhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 36.2]
uktvā na bhetavyam iti strījanaṃ sa tato 'rjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 37.1]
uttatāra jalāt tasmād gaṅgātoyād ivāñjanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 37.2]
krodhadūṣitanetrastu sa tato 'rjunapāvakaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 38.1]
prajajvāla mahāghoro yugānta iva pāvakaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 38.2]
sa tūrṇataram ādāya varahemāṅgado gadām | [Rām, Utt, 32 39.1]
abhidravati rakṣāṃsi tamāṃsīva divākaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 39.2]
bāhuvikṣepakaraṇāṃ samudyamya mahāgadām | [Rām, Utt, 32 40.1]
gāruḍaṃ vegam āsthāya āpapātaiva so 'rjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 40.2]
tasya mārgaṃ samāvṛtya vindhyo 'rkasyeva parvataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 41.1]
sthito vindhya ivākampyaḥ prahasto musalāyudhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 41.2]
tato 'sya musalaṃ ghoraṃ lohabaddhaṃ madoddhataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 42.1]
prahastaḥ preṣayan kruddho rarāsa ca yathāmbudaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 42.2]
tasyāgre musalasyāgnir aśokāpīḍasaṃnibhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 43.1]
prahastakaramuktasya babhūva pradahann iva | [Rām, Utt, 32 43.2]
ādhāvamānaṃ musalaṃ kārtavīryastadārjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 44.1]
nipuṇaṃ vañcayāmāsa sagado gajavikramaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 44.2]

apakrānteṣvamātyeṣu prahaste ca nipātite | [Rām, Utt, 32 48.1]

parasparaṃ gadābhyāṃ tau tāḍayāmāsatur bhṛśam | [Rām, Utt, 32 52.2]

durbaleva yathā senā dvidhābhūtāpatat kṣitau | [Rām, Utt, 32 60.2]
sa tvarjunapramuktena gadāpātena rāvaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 61.1]
apāsarpad dhanurmātraṃ niṣasāda ca niṣṭanan | [Rām, Utt, 32 61.2]
sa vihvalaṃ tad ālakṣya daśagrīvaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 32 62.1]
sahasā pratijagrāha garutmān iva pannagam | [Rām, Utt, 32 62.2]

bhittvā vidrāvayāmāsa vāyur ambudharān iva | [Rām, Utt, 32 70.2]
rākṣasāṃstrāsayitvā tu kārtavīryārjunastadā | [Rām, Utt, 32 71.1]

{Rām, Utt, 33}
rāvaṇagrahaṇaṃ tat tu vāyugrahaṇasaṃnibham | [Rām, Utt, 33 1.1]

tataḥ putrasutasnehāt kampyamāno mahādhṛtiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 33 2.1]

adyeyam amarāvatyā tulyā māhiṣmatī kṛtā | [Rām, Utt, 33 10.1]

yat te devagaṇair vandyau vande 'haṃ caraṇāvimau | [Rām, Utt, 33 11.2]
idaṃ rājyam ime putrā ime dārā ime vayam | [Rām, Utt, 33 12.1]
brahman kiṃ kurma kiṃ kāryam ājñāpayatu no bhavān | [Rām, Utt, 33 12.2]
taṃ dharme 'gniṣu bhṛtyeṣu śivaṃ pṛṣṭvātha pārthivam | [Rām, Utt, 33 13.1]
pulastyovāca rājānaṃ haihayānāṃ tadārjunam | [Rām, Utt, 33 13.2]
rājendrāmalapadmākṣapūrṇacandranibhānana | [Rām, Utt, 33 14.1]
atulaṃ te balaṃ yena daśagrīvastvayā jitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 33 14.2]
bhayād yasyāvatiṣṭhetāṃ niṣpandau sāgarānilau | [Rām, Utt, 33 15.1]

tat putraka yaśaḥ sphītaṃ nāma viśrāvitaṃ tvayā | [Rām, Utt, 33 16.1]
madvākyād yācyamāno 'dya muñca vatsa daśānanam | [Rām, Utt, 33 16.2]
pulastyājñāṃ sa gṛhyātha akiṃcanavaco 'rjunaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 33 17.1]
mumoca pārthivendrendro rākṣasendraṃ prahṛṣṭavat | [Rām, Utt, 33 17.2]
sa taṃ pramuktvā tridaśārim arjunaḥ prapūjya divyābharaṇasragambaraiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 33 18.1]

{Rām, Utt, 34}
arjunena vimuktastu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 34 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 35}
apṛcchata tato rāmo dakṣiṇāśālayaṃ munim | [Rām, Utt, 35 1.1]
prāñjalir vinayopeta idam āha vaco 'rthavat | [Rām, Utt, 35 1.2]
atulaṃ balam etābhyāṃ vālino rāvaṇasya ca | [Rām, Utt, 35 2.1]
na tvetau hanumadvīryaiḥ samāviti matir mama | [Rām, Utt, 35 2.2]
śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam | [Rām, Utt, 35 3.1]
vikramaśca prabhāvaśca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 35 3.2]
dṛṣṭvodadhiṃ viṣīdantīṃ tadaiṣa kapivāhinīm | [Rām, Utt, 35 4.1]

{Rām, Utt, 37}

{Rām, Utt, 38}

{Rām, Utt, 39}
tathā sma teṣāṃ vasatām ṛkṣavānararakṣasām | [Rām, Utt, 39 1.1]

evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rājendro hanūmantam athāsanāt | [Rām, Utt, 39 17.1]

{Rām, Utt, 40}

eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yat tvaṃ rāghavanandanam | [Rām, Utt, 40 8.1]
vaher lokasya saṃyānaṃ gacchasva vigatajvaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 40 8.2]

{Rām, Utt, 41}
sa visṛjya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam | [Rām, Utt, 41 1.1]

phullapadmotpalavanāścakravākopaśobhitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 41 8.1]

māṃsāni ca vicitrāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca | [Rām, Utt, 41 14.1]
rāmasyābhyavahārārthaṃ kiṃkarāstūrṇam āharan | [Rām, Utt, 41 14.2]
upanṛtyanti rājānaṃ nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 41 15.1]

ramayāmāsa vaidehīm ahanyahani devavat | [Rām, Utt, 41 16.2]
tathā tu ramamāṇasya tasyaivaṃ śiśiraḥ śubhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 41 17.1]
atyakrāmannarendrasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 41 17.2]
pūrvāhṇe paurakṛtyāni kṛtvā dharmeṇa dharmavit | [Rām, Utt, 41 18.1]
śeṣaṃ divasabhāgārdham antaḥpuragato 'bhavat | [Rām, Utt, 41 18.2]
sītā ca devakāryāṇi kṛtvā paurvāhṇikāni tu | [Rām, Utt, 41 19.1]

apatyalābho vaidehi mamāyaṃ samupasthitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 41 22.1]

eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yanmūlaphalabhojiṣu | [Rām, Utt, 41 25.1]
apyekarātraṃ kākutstha vaseyaṃ puṇyaśāliṣu | [Rām, Utt, 41 25.2]

{Rām, Utt, 42}
tatropaviṣṭaṃ rājānam upāsante vicakṣaṇāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 42 1.1]

kathayasva ca viśrabdho nirbhayo vigatajvaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 42 11.1]
kathayante yathā paurā janā janapadeṣu ca | [Rām, Utt, 42 11.2]
rāghaveṇaivam uktastu bhadraḥ suruciraṃ vacaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 42 12.1]
pratyuvāca mahābāhuṃ prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 42 12.2]
śṛṇu rājan yathā paurāḥ kathayanti śubhāśubham | [Rām, Utt, 42 13.1]
catvarāpaṇarathyāsu vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca | [Rām, Utt, 42 13.2]
duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān rāmaḥ samudre setubandhanam | [Rām, Utt, 42 14.1]

rāvaṇaśca durādharṣo hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 42 15.1]

kīdṛśaṃ hṛdaye tasya sītāsaṃbhogajaṃ sukham | [Rām, Utt, 42 17.1]

uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ katham etannivedyatām | [Rām, Utt, 42 21.2]
sarve tu śirasā bhūmāvabhivādya praṇamya ca | [Rām, Utt, 42 22.1]

{Rām, Utt, 43}
visṛjya tu suhṛdvargaṃ buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 1.1]
samīpe dvāḥstham āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 43 1.2]
śīghram ānaya saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam | [Rām, Utt, 43 2.1]
bharataṃ ca mahābāhuṃ śatrughnaṃ cāparājitam | [Rām, Utt, 43 2.2]

lakṣmaṇasya gṛhaṃ gatvā praviveśānivāritaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 3.2]

prādravad ratham āruhya rāghavasya niveśanam | [Rām, Utt, 43 5.2]

uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati | [Rām, Utt, 43 6.2]
bharatastu vacaḥ śrutvā dvāḥsthād rāmasamīritam | [Rām, Utt, 43 7.1]
utpapātāsanāt tūrṇaṃ padbhyām eva tato 'gamat | [Rām, Utt, 43 7.2]
dṛṣṭvā prayāntaṃ bharataṃ tvaramāṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 8.1]
śatrughnabhavanaṃ gatvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha | [Rām, Utt, 43 8.2]
ehyāgaccha raghuśreṣṭha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati | [Rām, Utt, 43 9.1]
gato hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ bharataśca mahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 9.2]
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya śatrughno rāmaśāsanam | [Rām, Utt, 43 10.1]
śirasā vandya dharaṇīṃ prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 10.2]
kumārān āgatāñśrutvā cintāvyākulitendriyaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 11.1]
avākśirā dīnamanā dvāḥsthaṃ vacanam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 43 11.2]
praveśaya kumārāṃstvaṃ matsamīpaṃ tvarānvitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 12.1]
eteṣu jīvitaṃ mahyam ete prāṇā bahiścarāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 12.2]
ājñaptāstu narendreṇa kumārāḥ śuklavāsasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 13.1]
prahvāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā viviśuste samāhitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 13.2]
te tu dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ tasya sagrahaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā | [Rām, Utt, 43 14.1]
saṃdhyāgatam ivādityaṃ prabhayā parivarjitam | [Rām, Utt, 43 14.2]
bāṣpapūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 15.1]
hataśobhaṃ yathā padmaṃ mukhaṃ vīkṣya ca tasya te | [Rām, Utt, 43 15.2]
tato 'bhivādya tvaritāḥ pādau rāmasya mūrdhabhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 16.1]
tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmaścāśrūṇyavartayat | [Rām, Utt, 43 16.2]
tān pariṣvajya bāhubhyām utthāpya ca mahābhujaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 43 17.1]

{Rām, Utt, 44}
teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīnacetasām | [Rām, Utt, 44 1.1]
uvāca vākyaṃ kākutstho mukhena pariśuṣyatā | [Rām, Utt, 44 1.2]
sarve śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo mā kurudhvaṃ mano 'nyathā | [Rām, Utt, 44 2.1]

vartate mayi bībhatsaḥ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati | [Rām, Utt, 44 3.2]

ayaṃ tu me mahān vādaḥ śokaśca hṛdi vartate | [Rām, Utt, 44 10.1]
paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃstathā janapadasya ca | [Rām, Utt, 44 10.2]
akīrtir yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasyacit | [Rām, Utt, 44 11.1]
patatyevādhamāṃllokān yāvacchabdaḥ sa kīrtyate | [Rām, Utt, 44 11.2]

kīrtyarthaṃ ca samārambhaḥ sarva eva mahātmanām | [Rām, Utt, 44 12.2]
apyahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ yuṣmān vā puruṣarṣabhāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 44 13.1]

tasmād bhavantaḥ paśyantu patitaṃ śokasāgare | [Rām, Utt, 44 14.1]
na hi paśyāmyahaṃ bhūyaḥ kiṃcid duḥkham ato 'dhikam | [Rām, Utt, 44 14.2]
śvastvaṃ prabhāte saumitre sumantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ ratham | [Rām, Utt, 44 15.1]
āruhya sītām āropya viṣayānte samutsṛja | [Rām, Utt, 44 15.2]
gaṅgāyāstu pare pāre vālmīkeḥ sumahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 44 16.1]
āśramo divyasaṃkāśastamasātīram āśritaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 44 16.2]
tatraināṃ vijane kakṣe visṛjya raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 44 17.1]
śīghram āgaccha saumitre kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama | [Rām, Utt, 44 17.2]
na cāsmi prativaktavyaḥ sītāṃ prati kathaṃcana | [Rām, Utt, 44 18.1]
aprītiḥ paramā mahyaṃ bhavet tu prativārite | [Rām, Utt, 44 18.2]
śāpitāśca mayā yūyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ jīvitena ca | [Rām, Utt, 44 19.1]

{Rām, Utt, 45}
tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 45 1.1]
sumantram abravīd vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā | [Rām, Utt, 45 1.2]
sārathe turagāñśīghraṃ yojayasva rathottame | [Rām, Utt, 45 2.1]

gaṅgātīre mayā devi munīnām āśrame śubhe | [Rām, Utt, 45 7.1]
śīghraṃ gatvopaneyāsi śāsanāt pārthivasya naḥ | [Rām, Utt, 45 7.2]
evam uktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 45 8.1]
praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe gamanaṃ cābhyarocayat | [Rām, Utt, 45 8.2]

api svasti bhavet tasya bhrātuste bhrātṛbhiḥ saha | [Rām, Utt, 45 14.1]
śvaśrūṇāṃ caiva me vīra sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 45 14.2]
pure janapade caiva kuśalaṃ prāṇinām api | [Rām, Utt, 45 15.1]
ityañjalikṛtā sītā devatā abhyayācata | [Rām, Utt, 45 15.2]
lakṣmaṇo 'rthaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm | [Rām, Utt, 45 16.1]
śivam ityabravīd dhṛṣṭo hṛdayena viśuṣyatā | [Rām, Utt, 45 16.2]
tato vāsam upāgamya gomatītīra āśrame | [Rām, Utt, 45 17.1]
prabhāte punar utthāya saumitriḥ sūtam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 45 17.2]
