tārayasva ca māṃ gaṅgāṃ darśayasva ca tāpasān | [Rām, Utt, 45 26.1]
tato dhanāni vāsāṃsi dāsyāmyābharaṇāni ca | [Rām, Utt, 45 26.2]
tataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīṇāṃ yathārham abhivādanam | [Rām, Utt, 45 27.1]
tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya yāsyāmastāṃ purīṃ punaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 45 27.2]
tasyāstad vacanaṃ śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe | [Rām, Utt, 45 28.1]
titīrṣur lakṣmaṇo gaṅgāṃ śubhāṃ nāvam upāharat | [Rām, Utt, 45 28.2]
{Rām, Utt, 46}
atha nāvaṃ suvistīrṇāṃ naiṣādīṃ rāghavānujaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 1.1]
āruroha samāyuktāṃ pūrvam āropya maithilīm | [Rām, Utt, 46 1.2]
sumantraṃ caiva sarathaṃ sthīyatām iti lakṣmaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 2.1]
uvāca śokasaṃtaptaḥ prayāhīti ca nāvikam | [Rām, Utt, 46 2.2]
tatastīram upāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 3.1]
uvāca maithilīṃ vākyaṃ prāñjalir bāṣpagadgadaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 3.2]
hṛdgataṃ me mahacchalyaṃ yad asmyāryeṇa dhīmatā | [Rām, Utt, 46 4.1]
asminnimitte vaidehi lokasya vacanīkṛtaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 4.2]
śreyo hi maraṇaṃ me 'dya mṛtyor vā yat paraṃ bhavet | [Rām, Utt, 46 5.1]
na cāsminn īdṛśe kārye niyojyo lokanindite | [Rām, Utt, 46 5.2]
prasīda na ca me roṣaṃ kartum arhasi suvrate | [Rām, Utt, 46 6.1]
ityañjalikṛto bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 6.2]
rudantaṃ prāñjaliṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantaṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 7.1]
maithilī bhṛśasaṃvignā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 46 7.2]
kim idaṃ nāvagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa | [Rām, Utt, 46 8.1]
paśyāmi tvāṃ ca na svastham api kṣemaṃ mahīpateḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 8.2]
śāpito 'si narendreṇa yat tvaṃ saṃtāpam ātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 9.1]
tad brūyāḥ saṃnidhau mahyam aham ājñāpayāmi te | [Rām, Utt, 46 9.2]
vaidehyā codyamānastu lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 10.1]
avāṅmukho bāṣpagalo vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 46 10.2]
śrutvā pariṣado madhye apavādaṃ sudāruṇam | [Rām, Utt, 46 11.1]
pure janapade caiva tvatkṛte janakātmaje | [Rām, Utt, 46 11.2]
na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tavāgrataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 12.1]
yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastānyamarṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 12.2]
sā tvaṃ tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama saṃnidhau | [Rām, Utt, 46 13.1]
paurāpavādabhītena grāhyaṃ devi na te 'nyathā | [Rām, Utt, 46 13.2]
āśramānteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 46 14.1]
rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tavaivaṃ kila daurhṛdam | [Rām, Utt, 46 14.2]
tad etajjāhnavītīre brahmarṣīṇāṃ tapovanam | [Rām, Utt, 46 15.1]
puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śubhe | [Rām, Utt, 46 15.2]
rājño daśarathasyaiṣa pitur me munipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 16.1]
sakhā paramako vipro vālmīkiḥ sumahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 16.2]
pādacchāyām upāgamya sukham asya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 46 17.1]
upavāsaparaikāgrā vasa tvaṃ janakātmaje | [Rām, Utt, 46 17.2]
pativratātvam āsthāya rāmaṃ kṛtvā sadā hṛdi | [Rām, Utt, 46 18.1]
śreyaste paramaṃ devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 46 18.2]
{Rām, Utt, 47}
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dāruṇaṃ janakātmajā | [Rām, Utt, 47 1.1]
paraṃ viṣādam āgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha | [Rām, Utt, 47 1.2]
sā muhūrtam ivāsaṃjñā bāṣpavyākulitekṣaṇā | [Rām, Utt, 47 2.1]
lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnayā vācā uvāca janakātmajā | [Rām, Utt, 47 2.2]
māmikeyaṃ tanur nūnaṃ sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa | [Rām, Utt, 47 3.1]
dhātrā yasyāstathā me 'dya duḥkhamūrtiḥ pradṛśyate | [Rām, Utt, 47 3.2]
kiṃ nu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ ko vā dārair viyojitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 47 4.1]
yāhaṃ śuddhasamācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī | [Rām, Utt, 47 4.2]
purāham āśrame vāsaṃ rāmapādānuvartinī | [Rām, Utt, 47 5.1]
anurudhyāpi saumitre duḥkhe viparivartinī | [Rām, Utt, 47 5.2]
sā kathaṃ hyāśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā | [Rām, Utt, 47 6.1]
ākhyāsyāmi ca kasyāhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā | [Rām, Utt, 47 6.2]
kiṃ ca vakṣyāmi muniṣu kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ nṛpe | [Rām, Utt, 47 7.1]
kasmin vā kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 47 7.2]
na khalvadyaiva saumitre jīvitaṃ jāhnavījale | [Rām, Utt, 47 8.1]
tyajeyaṃ rājavaṃśastu bhartur me parihāsyate | [Rām, Utt, 47 8.2]
yathājñāṃ kuru saumitre tyaja māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm | [Rām, Utt, 47 9.1]
nideśe sthīyatāṃ rājñaḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama | [Rām, Utt, 47 9.2]
śvaśrūṇām aviśeṣeṇa prāñjaliḥ pragraheṇa ca | [Rām, Utt, 47 10.1]
śirasā vandya caraṇau kuśalaṃ brūhi pārthivam | [Rām, Utt, 47 10.2]
yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethāstathā paureṣu nityadā | [Rām, Utt, 47 11.1]
paramo hyeṣa dharmaḥ syād eṣā kīrtir anuttamā | [Rām, Utt, 47 11.2]
yat tvaṃ paurajanaṃ rājan dharmeṇa samavāpnuyāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 47 12.1]
ahaṃ tu nānuśocāmi svaśarīraṃ nararṣabha | [Rām, Utt, 47 12.2]
yathāpavādaṃ paurāṇāṃ tathaiva raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 47 12.3]
evaṃ bruvantyāṃ sītāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 47 13.1]
śirasā dharaṇīṃ gatvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha | [Rām, Utt, 47 13.2]
pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kṛtvā sa rudann eva mahāsvanam | [Rām, Utt, 47 14.1]
āruroha punar nāvaṃ nāvikaṃ cābhyacodayat | [Rām, Utt, 47 14.2]
sa gatvā cottaraṃ kūlaṃ śokabhārasamanvitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 47 15.1]
saṃmūḍha iva duḥkhena ratham adhyāruhad drutam | [Rām, Utt, 47 15.2]
muhur muhur apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītām anāthavat | [Rām, Utt, 47 16.1]
veṣṭantīṃ paratīrasthāṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayāvatha | [Rām, Utt, 47 16.2]
dūrasthaṃ ratham ālokya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 47 17.1]
nirīkṣamāṇām udvignāṃ sītāṃ śokaḥ samāviśat | [Rām, Utt, 47 17.2]
sā duḥkhabhārāvanatā tapasvinī yaśodharā nātham apaśyatī satī | [Rām, Utt, 47 18.1]
ruroda sā barhiṇanādite vane mahāsvanaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā satī | [Rām, Utt, 47 18.2]
{Rām, Utt, 48}
sītāṃ tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatra munidārakāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 1.1]
prādravan yatra bhagavān āste vālmīkir agryadhīḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 1.2]
abhivādya muneḥ pādau muniputrā maharṣaye | [Rām, Utt, 48 2.1]
sarve nivedayāmāsustasyāstu ruditasvanam | [Rām, Utt, 48 2.2]
adṛṣṭapūrvā bhagavan kasyāpyeṣā mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 3.1]
patnī śrīr iva saṃmohād virauti vikṛtasvarā | [Rām, Utt, 48 3.2]
bhagavan sādhu paśyemāṃ devatām iva khāccyutām | [Rām, Utt, 48 4.1]
na hyenāṃ mānuṣīṃ vidmaḥ satkriyāsyāḥ prayujyatām | [Rām, Utt, 48 4.2]
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharmavit | [Rām, Utt, 48 5.1]
tapasā labdhacakṣuṣmān prādravad yatra maithilī | [Rām, Utt, 48 5.2]
taṃ tu deśam abhipretya kiṃcit padbhyāṃ mahāmuniḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 6.1]
arghyam ādāya ruciraṃ jāhnavītīram āśritaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 6.2]
dadarśa rāghavasyeṣṭāṃ patnīṃ sītām anāthavat | [Rām, Utt, 48 6.3]
tāṃ sitāṃ śokabhārārtāṃ vālmīkir munipuṃgavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 7.1]
uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ hlādayann iva tejasā | [Rām, Utt, 48 7.2]
snuṣā daśarathasya tvaṃ rāmasya mahiṣī satī | [Rām, Utt, 48 8.1]
janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgataṃ te pativrate | [Rām, Utt, 48 8.2]
āyāntyevāsi vijñātā mayā dharmasamādhinā | [Rām, Utt, 48 9.1]
kāraṇaṃ caiva sarvaṃ me hṛdayenopalakṣitam | [Rām, Utt, 48 9.2]
apāpāṃ vedmi sīte tvāṃ tapolabdhena cakṣuṣā | [Rām, Utt, 48 10.1]
viśuddhabhāvā vaidehi sāmprataṃ mayi vartase | [Rām, Utt, 48 10.2]
āśramasyāvidūre me tāpasyastapasi sthitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 11.1]
tāstvāṃ vatse yathā vatsaṃ pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 11.2]
idam arghyaṃ pratīccha tvaṃ viśrabdhā vigatajvarā | [Rām, Utt, 48 12.1]
yathā svagṛham abhyetya viṣādaṃ caiva mā kṛthāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 12.2]
śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ sītā muneḥ paramam adbhutam | [Rām, Utt, 48 13.1]
śirasā vandya caraṇau tathetyāha kṛtāñjaliḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 13.2]
taṃ prayāntaṃ muniṃ sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt | [Rām, Utt, 48 14.1]
anvayād yatra tāpasyo dharmanityāḥ samāhitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 14.2]
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munim āyāntaṃ vaidehyānugataṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 48 15.1]
upājagmur mudā yuktā vacanaṃ cedam abruvan | [Rām, Utt, 48 15.2]
svāgataṃ te muniśreṣṭha cirasyāgamanaṃ prabho | [Rām, Utt, 48 16.1]
abhivādayāmaḥ sarvāstvām ucyatāṃ kiṃ ca kurmahe | [Rām, Utt, 48 16.2]
tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir idam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 48 17.1]
sīteyaṃ samanuprāptā patnī rāmasya dhīmataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 17.2]
snuṣā daśarathasyaiṣā janakasya sutā satī | [Rām, Utt, 48 18.1]
apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā | [Rām, Utt, 48 18.2]
imāṃ bhavatyaḥ paśyantu snehena parameṇa ha | [Rām, Utt, 48 19.1]
gauravānmama vākyasya pūjyā vo 'stu viśeṣataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 19.2]
muhur muhuśca vaidehīṃ parisāntvya mahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 20.1]
svam āśramaṃ śiṣyavṛtaḥ punar āyānmahātapāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 48 20.2]
{Rām, Utt, 49}
dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīṃ sītām āśramaṃ saṃpraveśitām | [Rām, Utt, 49 1.1]
saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 1.2]
abravīcca mahātejāḥ sumantraṃ mantrasārathim | [Rām, Utt, 49 2.1]
sītāsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśya rāmasya dhīmataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 2.2]
ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 49 3.1]
patnīṃ śuddhasamācārāṃ visṛjya janakātmajām | [Rām, Utt, 49 3.2]
vyaktaṃ daivād ahaṃ manye rāghavasya vinābhavam | [Rām, Utt, 49 4.1]
vaidehyā sārathe sārdhaṃ daivaṃ hi duratikramam | [Rām, Utt, 49 4.2]
yo hi devān sagandharvān asurān saha rākṣasaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 5.1]
nihanyād rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivam anuvartate | [Rām, Utt, 49 5.2]
purā mama pitur vākyair daṇḍake vijane vane | [Rām, Utt, 49 6.1]
uṣito navavarṣāṇi pañca caiva sudāruṇe | [Rām, Utt, 49 6.2]
tato duḥkhataraṃ bhūyaḥ sītāyā vipravāsanam | [Rām, Utt, 49 7.1]
paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā nṛśaṃsaṃ pratibhāti me | [Rām, Utt, 49 7.2]
ko nu dharmāśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇyasmin yaśohare | [Rām, Utt, 49 8.1]
maithilīṃ prati samprāptaḥ paurair hīnārthavādibhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 8.2]
etā bahuvidhā vācaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇabhāṣitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 9.1]
sumantraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 49 9.2]
na saṃtāpastvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīṃ prati | [Rām, Utt, 49 10.1]
dṛṣṭam etat purā vipraiḥ pituste lakṣmaṇāgrataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 10.2]
bhaviṣyati dṛḍhaṃ rāmo duḥkhaprāyo 'lpasaukhyavān | [Rām, Utt, 49 11.1]
tvāṃ caiva maithilīṃ caiva śatrughnabharatau tathā | [Rām, Utt, 49 11.2]
saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā mahān | [Rām, Utt, 49 11.3]
na tvidaṃ tvayi vaktavyaṃ saumitre bharate 'pi vā | [Rām, Utt, 49 12.1]
rājñā vo 'vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ durvāsā yad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 49 12.2]
mahārājasamīpe ca mama caiva nararṣabha | [Rām, Utt, 49 13.1]
ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃnidhau | [Rām, Utt, 49 13.2]
ṛṣestu vacanaṃ śrutvā mām āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 14.1]
sūta na kvacid evaṃ te vaktavyaṃ janasaṃnidhau | [Rām, Utt, 49 14.2]
tasyāhaṃ lokapālasya vākyaṃ tat susamāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 15.1]
naiva jātvanṛtaṃ kuryām iti me saumya darśanam | [Rām, Utt, 49 15.2]
sarvathā nāstyavaktavyaṃ mayā saumya tavāgrataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 49 16.1]
yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatāṃ raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 49 16.2]
yadyapyahaṃ narendreṇa rahasyaṃ śrāvitaḥ purā | [Rām, Utt, 49 17.1]
taccāpyudāhariṣyāmi daivaṃ hi duratikramam | [Rām, Utt, 49 17.2]
tacchrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya gambhīrārthapadaṃ mahat | [Rām, Utt, 49 18.1]
tathyaṃ brūhīti saumitriḥ sūtaṃ vākyam athābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 49 18.2]
{Rām, Utt, 50}
tathā saṃcoditaḥ sūto lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 50 1.1]
tad vākyam ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vyāhartum upacakrame | [Rām, Utt, 50 1.2]
purā nāmnā hi durvāsā atreḥ putro mahāmuniḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 2.1]
vasiṣṭhasyāśrame puṇye sa vārṣikyam uvāsa ha | [Rām, Utt, 50 2.2]
tam āśramaṃ mahātejāḥ pitā te sumahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 3.1]
purodhasaṃ mahātmānaṃ didṛkṣur agamat svayam | [Rām, Utt, 50 3.2]
sa dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā | [Rām, Utt, 50 4.1]
upaviṣṭaṃ vasiṣṭhasya savye pārśve mahāmunim | [Rām, Utt, 50 4.2]
tau munī tāpasaśreṣṭhau vinītastvabhyavādayat | [Rām, Utt, 50 4.3]
sa tābhyāṃ pūjito rājā svāgatenāsanena ca | [Rām, Utt, 50 5.1]
pādyena phalamūlaiśca so 'pyāste munibhiḥ saha | [Rām, Utt, 50 5.2]
teṣāṃ tatropaviṣṭānāṃ tāstāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 6.1]
babhūvuḥ paramarṣīṇāṃ madhyādityagate 'hani | [Rām, Utt, 50 6.2]
tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃcit prāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 7.1]
uvāca taṃ mahātmānam atreḥ putraṃ tapodhanam | [Rām, Utt, 50 7.2]
bhagavan kiṃ pramāṇena mama vaṃśo bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 50 8.1]
kimāyuśca hi me rāmaḥ putrāścānye kimāyuṣaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 8.2]
rāmasya ca sutā ye syusteṣām āyuḥ kiyad bhavet | [Rām, Utt, 50 9.1]
kāmyayā bhagavan brūhi vaṃśasyāsya gatiṃ mama | [Rām, Utt, 50 9.2]
tacchrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rājño daśarathasya tu | [Rām, Utt, 50 10.1]
durvāsāḥ sumahātejā vyāhartum upacakrame | [Rām, Utt, 50 10.2]
ayodhyāyāḥ patī rāmo dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 50 11.1]
sukhinaśca samṛddhāśca bhaviṣyantyasya cānujāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 11.2]
kasmiṃścit kāraṇe tvāṃ ca maithilīṃ ca yaśasvinīm | [Rām, Utt, 50 12.1]
saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā kila | [Rām, Utt, 50 12.2]
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca | [Rām, Utt, 50 13.1]
rāmo rājyam upāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 50 13.2]
samṛddhair hayamedhaiśca iṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 14.1]
rājavaṃśāṃśca kākutstho bahūn saṃsthāpayiṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 50 14.2]
sa sarvam akhilaṃ rājño vaṃśasyāsya gatāgatam | [Rām, Utt, 50 15.1]
ākhyāya sumahātejāstūṣṇīm āsīnmahādyutiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 50 15.2]
tūṣṇīṃbhūte munau tasmin rājā daśarathastadā | [Rām, Utt, 50 16.1]
abhivādya mahātmānau punar āyāt purottamam | [Rām, Utt, 50 16.2]
etad vaco mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtaṃ purā | [Rām, Utt, 50 17.1]
śrutaṃ hṛdi ca nikṣiptaṃ nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 50 17.2]
evaṃgate na saṃtāpaṃ gantum arhasi rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 50 18.1]
sītārthe rāghavārthe vā dṛḍho bhava narottama | [Rām, Utt, 50 18.2]
tacchrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sūtasya paramādbhutam | [Rām, Utt, 50 19.1]
praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhviti cābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 50 19.2]

{Rām, Utt, 51}
tatra tāṃ rajanīm uṣya gomatyāṃ raghunandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 1.1]

tato 'rdhadivase prāpte praviveśa mahārathaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 2.1]

saumitristu paraṃ dainyaṃ jagāma sumahāmatiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 3.1]
rāmapādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kim ahaṃ gataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 3.2]

avāṅmukho dīnamanāḥ praviveśānivāritaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 5.2]
sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ dīnam āsīnaṃ paramāsane | [Rām, Utt, 51 6.1]

uvāca dīnayā vācā prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 7.2]
āryasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya visṛjya janakātmajām | [Rām, Utt, 51 8.1]
gaṅgātīre yathoddiṣṭe vālmīker āśrame śubhe | [Rām, Utt, 51 8.2]
punar asmyāgato vīra pādamūlam upāsitum | [Rām, Utt, 51 8.3]
mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra kālasya gatir īdṛśī | [Rām, Utt, 51 9.1]
tvadvidhā na hi śocanti sattvavanto manasvinaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 9.2]
sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 10.1]
saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam | [Rām, Utt, 51 10.2]
śaktastvam ātmanātmānaṃ vijetuṃ manasaiva hi | [Rām, Utt, 51 11.1]
lokān sarvāṃśca kākutstha kiṃ punar duḥkham īdṛśam | [Rām, Utt, 51 11.2]
nedṛśeṣu vimuhyanti tvadvidhāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 12.1]
yadarthaṃ maithilī tyaktā apavādabhayānnṛpa | [Rām, Utt, 51 12.2]
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 51 13.1]
tyajemāṃ durbalāṃ buddhiṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kuruṣva ha | [Rām, Utt, 51 13.2]
evam uktastu kākutstho lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 51 14.1]
uvāca parayā prītyā saumitriṃ mitravatsalam | [Rām, Utt, 51 14.2]
evam etannaraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa | [Rām, Utt, 51 15.1]
paritoṣaśca me vīra mama kāryānuśāsane | [Rām, Utt, 51 15.2]

{Rām, Utt, 52}
tataḥ sumantrastvāgamya rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 52 1.1]
ete nivāritā rājan dvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 52 1.2]

imānyāsanamukhyāni yathārham upaviśyatām | [Rām, Utt, 52 8.2]
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 52 9.1]

tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sādhuvādo mahān abhūt | [Rām, Utt, 52 13.1]
ṛṣīṇām ugratapasāṃ yamunātīravāsinām | [Rām, Utt, 52 13.2]
ūcuśca te mahātmāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 52 14.1]
upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tavaiva bhuvi nānyataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 52 14.2]
bahavaḥ pārthivā rājann atikrāntā mahābalāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 52 15.1]
kāryagauravam aśrutvā pratijñāṃ nābhyarocayan | [Rām, Utt, 52 15.2]
tvayā punar brāhmaṇagauravād iyaṃ kṛtvā pratijñā hyanavekṣya kāraṇam | [Rām, Utt, 52 16.1]
kuruṣva kartā hyasi nātra saṃśayo mahābhayāt trātum ṛṣīṃstvam arhasi | [Rām, Utt, 52 16.2]
{Rām, Utt, 53}
bruvadbhir evam ṛṣibhiḥ kākutstho vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 53 1.1]
kiṃ kāryaṃ brūta bhavatāṃ bhayaṃ nāśayitāsmi vaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 1.2]
tathā vadati kākutsthe bhārgavo vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 53 2.1]
bhayaṃ naḥ śṛṇu yanmūlaṃ deśasya ca nareśvara | [Rām, Utt, 53 2.2]
pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma daiteyaḥ sumahābalaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 3.1]
lolāputro 'bhavajjyeṣṭho madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 3.2]

bahumānācca rudreṇa dattastasyādbhuto varaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 5.2]
śūlaṃ śūlād viniṣkṛṣya mahāvīryaṃ mahāprabham | [Rām, Utt, 53 6.1]
dadau mahātmā suprīto vākyaṃ caitad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 53 6.2]

prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmyāyudham uttamam | [Rām, Utt, 53 7.2]

yaśca tvām abhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigatajvaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 9.1]
taṃ śūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā punar eṣyati te karam | [Rām, Utt, 53 9.2]
evaṃ rudrād varaṃ labdhvā bhūya eva mahāsuraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 10.1]
praṇipatya mahādevaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 53 10.2]

bhavet tu satataṃ deva surāṇām īśvaro hyasi | [Rām, Utt, 53 11.2]
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ madhuṃ devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 12.1]
pratyuvāca mahādevo naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 53 12.2]
mā bhūt te viphalā vāṇī matprāsādakṛtā śubhā | [Rām, Utt, 53 13.1]

yāvat karasthaḥ śūlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati sutasya te | [Rām, Utt, 53 14.1]
avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ śūlahasto bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 53 14.2]
evaṃ madhuvaraṃ labdhvā devāt sumahad adbhutam | [Rām, Utt, 53 15.1]
bhavanaṃ cāsuraśreṣṭhaḥ kārayāmāsa suprabham | [Rām, Utt, 53 15.2]
tasya patnī mahābhāgā priyā kumbhīnasī hi yā | [Rām, Utt, 53 16.1]
viśvāsayor apatyaṃ sā hyanalāyāṃ mahāprabhā | [Rām, Utt, 53 16.2]
tasyāḥ putro mahāvīryo lavaṇo nāma dāruṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 17.1]
bālyāt prabhṛti duṣṭātmā pāpānyeva samācarat | [Rām, Utt, 53 17.2]
taṃ putraṃ durvinītaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 53 18.1]
madhuḥ sa śokam āpede na cainaṃ kiṃcid abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 53 18.2]

evaṃprabhāvo lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ caiva tathāvidham | [Rām, Utt, 53 21.1]

bahavaḥ pārthivā rāma bhayārtair ṛṣibhiḥ purā | [Rām, Utt, 53 22.1]

{Rām, Utt, 54}
tathokte tān ṛṣīn rāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 1.1]
kimāhāraḥ kimācāro lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate | [Rām, Utt, 54 1.2]
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te | [Rām, Utt, 54 2.1]
tato nivedayāmāsur lavaṇo vavṛdhe yathā | [Rām, Utt, 54 2.2]
āhāraḥ sarvasattvāni viśeṣeṇa ca tāpasāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 3.1]
ācāro raudratā nityaṃ vāso madhuvane sadā | [Rām, Utt, 54 3.2]
hatvā daśasahasrāṇi siṃhavyāghramṛgadvipān | [Rām, Utt, 54 4.1]
mānuṣāṃścaiva kurute nityam āhāram āhnikam | [Rām, Utt, 54 4.2]
tato 'parāṇi sattvāni khādate sa mahābalaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 5.1]
saṃhāre samanuprāpte vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 5.2]
tacchrutvā rāghavo vākyam uvāca sa mahāmunīn | [Rām, Utt, 54 6.1]
ghātayiṣyāmi tad rakṣo vyapagacchatu vo bhayam | [Rām, Utt, 54 6.2]
tathā teṣāṃ pratijñāya munīnām ugratejasām | [Rām, Utt, 54 7.1]
sa bhrātṝn sahitān sarvān uvāca raghunandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 7.2]
ko hantā lavaṇaṃ vīrāḥ kasyāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām | [Rām, Utt, 54 8.1]
bharatasya mahābāhoḥ śatrughnasyāthavā punaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 8.2]
rāghaveṇaivam uktastu bharato vākyam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 54 9.1]
aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi mamāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām | [Rām, Utt, 54 9.2]
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śauryavīryasamanvitam | [Rām, Utt, 54 10.1]
lakṣmaṇāvarajastasthau hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam | [Rām, Utt, 54 10.2]
śatrughnastvabravīd vākyaṃ praṇipatya narādhipam | [Rām, Utt, 54 11.1]
kṛtakarmā mahābāhur madhyamo raghunandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 11.2]
āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā ayodhyā rakṣitā purī | [Rām, Utt, 54 12.1]
saṃtāpaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā āryasyāgamanaṃ prati | [Rām, Utt, 54 12.2]
duḥkhāni ca bahūnīha anubhūtāni pārthiva | [Rām, Utt, 54 13.1]
śayāno duḥkhaśayyāsu nandigrāme mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 54 13.2]
phalamūlāśano bhūtvā jaṭācīradharastathā | [Rām, Utt, 54 14.1]
anubhūyedṛśaṃ duḥkham eṣa rāghavanandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 54 14.2]
preṣye mayi sthite rājanna bhūyaḥ kleśam āpnuyāt | [Rām, Utt, 54 14.3]
tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punar abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 54 15.1]
evaṃ bhavatu kākutstha kriyatāṃ mama śāsanam | [Rām, Utt, 54 15.2]
rājye tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi madhostu nagare śubhe | [Rām, Utt, 54 16.1]
niveśaya mahābāho bharataṃ yadyavekṣase | [Rām, Utt, 54 16.2]
śūrastvaṃ kṛtavidyaśca samarthaḥ saṃniveśane | [Rām, Utt, 54 17.1]
nagaraṃ madhunā juṣṭaṃ tathā janapadāñśubhān | [Rām, Utt, 54 17.2]

vasiṣṭhapramukhair viprair vidhimantrapuraskṛtam | [Rām, Utt, 54 21.2]
{Rām, Utt, 55}
evam uktastu rāmeṇa parāṃ vrīḍām upāgataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 1.1]
śatrughno vīryasampanno mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 55 1.2]
avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca śāsanaṃ puruṣarṣabha | [Rām, Utt, 55 2.1]
tava caiva mahābhāga śāsanaṃ duratikramam | [Rām, Utt, 55 2.2]
ayaṃ kāmakaro rājaṃstavāsmi puruṣarṣabha | [Rām, Utt, 55 2.3]
evam ukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 55 3.1]
uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ tathā | [Rām, Utt, 55 3.2]
saṃbhārān abhiṣekasya ānayadhvaṃ samāhitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 4.1]
adyaiva puruṣavyāghram abhiṣekṣyāmi durjayam | [Rām, Utt, 55 4.2]
purodhasaṃ ca kākutsthau naigamān ṛtvijastathā | [Rām, Utt, 55 5.1]
mantriṇaścaiva me sarvān ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā | [Rām, Utt, 55 5.2]
rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tathākurvan mahārathaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 6.1]
abhiṣekasamārambhaṃ puraskṛtya purodhasaṃ | [Rām, Utt, 55 6.2]
praviṣṭā rājabhavanaṃ puraṃdaragṛhopamam | [Rām, Utt, 55 6.3]
tato 'bhiṣeko vavṛdhe śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 7.1]
sampraharṣakaraḥ śrīmān rāghavasya purasya ca | [Rām, Utt, 55 7.2]
tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ śatrughnam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 8.1]
uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tejastasyābhipūrayan | [Rām, Utt, 55 8.2]
ayaṃ śarastvamoghaste divyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 9.1]
anena lavaṇaṃ saumya hantāsi raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 55 9.2]
sṛṣṭaḥ śaro 'yaṃ kākutstha yadā śete mahārṇave | [Rām, Utt, 55 10.1]
svayambhūr ajito devo yaṃ nāpaśyan surāsurāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 10.2]
adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tenāyaṃ hi śarottamaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 11.1]
sṛṣṭaḥ krodhābhibhūtena vināśārthaṃ durātmanoḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 11.2]
madhukaiṭabhayor vīra vighāte vartamānayoḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 11.3]
sraṣṭukāmena lokāṃstrīṃstau cānena hatau yudhi | [Rām, Utt, 55 12.1]
anena śaramukhyena tato lokāṃścakāra saḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 12.2]
nāyaṃ mayā śaraḥ pūrvaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhārthinā | [Rām, Utt, 55 13.1]
muktaḥ śatrughna bhūtānāṃ mahāṃstrāso bhaved iti | [Rām, Utt, 55 13.2]
yacca tasya mahacchūlaṃ tryambakeṇa mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 55 14.1]
dattaṃ śatruvināśāya madhor āyudham uttamam | [Rām, Utt, 55 14.2]
tat saṃnikṣipya bhavane pūjyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 15.1]
diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya prāpnotyāhāram ātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 15.2]
yadā tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan kaścid enaṃ samāhvayet | [Rām, Utt, 55 16.1]
tadā śūlaṃ gṛhītvā tad bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti tam | [Rām, Utt, 55 16.2]
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam āyudhavivarjitam | [Rām, Utt, 55 17.1]
apraviṣṭapuraṃ pūrvaṃ dvāri tiṣṭha dhṛtāyudhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 55 17.2]
apraviṣṭaṃ ca bhavanaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabha | [Rām, Utt, 55 18.1]
āhvayethā mahābāho tato hantāsi rākṣasaṃ | [Rām, Utt, 55 18.2]
anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 55 19.1]
yadi tvevaṃ kṛte vīra vināśam upayāsyati | [Rām, Utt, 55 19.2]

{Rām, Utt, 56}

{Rām, Utt, 57}

vijvaro vigatāmarṣo hataṃ rakṣo 'bhyavaikṣata | [Rām, Utt, 57 14.2]

evam uktvā tu taṃ rakṣastatraivāntaradhīyata | [Rām, Utt, 57 17.1]

adya yajñāvasānānte sāmiṣaṃ bhojanaṃ mama | [Rām, Utt, 57 21.1]

tathā kuruṣva śīghraṃ vai parituṣyed yathā guruḥ | [Rām, Utt, 57 23.2]

{Rām, Utt, 58}
yām eva rātriṃ śatrughnaḥ parṇaśālāṃ samāviśat | [Rām, Utt, 58 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 59}
atha rātryāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ śatrughno bhṛgunandanam | [Rām, Utt, 59 1.1]
papraccha cyavanaṃ vipraṃ lavaṇasya balābalam | [Rām, Utt, 59 1.2]
śūlasya ca balaṃ brahman ke ca pūrvaṃ nipātitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 59 2.1]

ājagāma madhoḥ putraṃ vaśe kartum aninditaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 59 16.2]

evaṃ sa rājā sumahān hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 59 22.1]
śūlasya ca balaṃ vīra aprameyam anuttamam | [Rām, Utt, 59 22.2]

{Rām, Utt, 60}
kathāṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayaṃ cākāṅkṣatāṃ śubham | [Rām, Utt, 60 1.1]
vyatītā rajanī śīghraṃ śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 1.2]
tataḥ prabhāte vimale tasmin kāle sa rākṣasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 2.1]

āgacchad bahusahasraṃ prāṇinām udvahan bharam | [Rām, Utt, 60 4.2]

tam uvāca tato rakṣaḥ kim anena kariṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 60 5.2]
īdṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi sāyudhānāṃ narādhama | [Rām, Utt, 60 6.1]
bhakṣitāni mayā roṣāt kālam ākāṅkṣase nu kim | [Rām, Utt, 60 6.2]
āhāraścāpyasaṃpūrṇo mamāyaṃ puruṣādhama | [Rām, Utt, 60 7.1]
svayaṃ praviṣṭo nu mukhaṃ katham āsādya durmate | [Rām, Utt, 60 7.2]
tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya hasataśca muhur muhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 8.1]
śatrughno vīryasampanno roṣād aśrūṇyavartayat | [Rām, Utt, 60 8.2]
tasya roṣābhibhūtasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 9.1]
tejomayā marīcyastu sarvagātrair viniṣpatan | [Rām, Utt, 60 9.2]
uvāca ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śatrughnastaṃ niśācaram | [Rām, Utt, 60 10.1]
yoddhum icchāmi durbuddhe dvandvayuddhaṃ tvayā saha | [Rām, Utt, 60 10.2]
putro daśarathasyāhaṃ bhrātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 11.1]
śatrughno nāma śatrughno vadhākāṅkṣī tavāgataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 11.2]
tasya me yuddhakāmasya dvandvayuddhaṃ pradīyatām | [Rām, Utt, 60 12.1]
śatrustvaṃ sarvajīvānāṃ na me jīvan gamiṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 60 12.2]
tasmiṃstathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasann iva | [Rām, Utt, 60 13.1]
pratyuvāca naraśreṣṭhaṃ diṣṭyā prāpto 'si durmate | [Rām, Utt, 60 13.2]
mama mātṛṣvasur bhrātā rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 14.1]
hato rāmeṇa durbuddhe strīhetoḥ puruṣādhama | [Rām, Utt, 60 14.2]
tacca sarvaṃ mayā kṣāntaṃ rāvaṇasya kulakṣayam | [Rām, Utt, 60 15.1]
avajñāṃ purataḥ kṛtvā mayā yūyaṃ viśeṣataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 15.2]
na hatāśca hi me sarve paribhūtāstṛṇaṃ yathā | [Rām, Utt, 60 16.1]
bhūtaścaiva bhaviṣyāśca yūyaṃ ca puruṣādhamāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 60 16.2]
tasya te yuddhakāmasya yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi durmate | [Rām, Utt, 60 17.1]
īpsitaṃ yādṛśaṃ tubhyaṃ sajjaye yāvad āyudham | [Rām, Utt, 60 17.2]
tam uvācātha śatrughnaḥ kva me jīvan gamiṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 60 18.1]
durbalo 'pyāgataḥ śatrur na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 60 18.2]
yo hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaraṃ śatrave dadau | [Rām, Utt, 60 19.1]
sa hato mandabuddhitvād yathā kāpuruṣastathā | [Rām, Utt, 60 19.2]
{Rām, Utt, 61}
tacchrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 1.1]
krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 61 1.2]
pāṇau pāṇiṃ viniṣpiṣya dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca | [Rām, Utt, 61 2.1]
lavaṇo raghuśārdūlam āhvayāmāsa cāsakṛt | [Rām, Utt, 61 2.2]
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tathā vākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ ghoravikramam | [Rām, Utt, 61 3.1]
śatrughno devaśatrughna idaṃ vacanam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 61 3.2]
śatrughno na tadā jāto yadānye nirjitāstvayā | [Rām, Utt, 61 4.1]
tad adya bāṇābhihato vraja tvaṃ yamasādanam | [Rām, Utt, 61 4.2]
ṛṣayo 'pyadya pāpātmanmayā tvāṃ nihataṃ raṇe | [Rām, Utt, 61 5.1]
paśyantu viprā vidvāṃsastridaśā iva rāvaṇam | [Rām, Utt, 61 5.2]
tvayi madbāṇanirdagdhe patite 'dya niśācara | [Rām, Utt, 61 6.1]
puraṃ janapadaṃ cāpi kṣemam etad bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 61 6.2]

pravekṣyate te hṛdayaṃ padmam aṃśur ivārkajaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 7.2]
evam ukto mahāvṛkṣaṃ lavaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 8.1]
śatrughnorasi cikṣepa taṃ śūraḥ śatadhāchinat | [Rām, Utt, 61 8.2]
tad dṛṣṭvā viphalaṃ karma rākṣasaḥ punar eva tu | [Rām, Utt, 61 9.1]
pādapān subahūn gṛhya śatrughne vyasṛjad balī | [Rām, Utt, 61 9.2]
śatrughnaścāpi tejasvī vṛkṣān āpatato bahūn | [Rām, Utt, 61 10.1]
tribhiścaturbhir ekaikaṃ cicheda nataparvabhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 10.2]
tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjad rākṣasorasi | [Rām, Utt, 61 11.1]
śatrughno vīryasampanno vivyathe na ca rākṣasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 11.2]
tataḥ prahasya lavaṇo vṛkṣam utpāṭya līlayā | [Rām, Utt, 61 12.1]
śirasyabhyahanacchūraṃ srastāṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai | [Rām, Utt, 61 12.2]
tasminnipatite vīre hāhākāro mahān abhūt | [Rām, Utt, 61 13.1]
ṛṣīṇāṃ devasaṃghānāṃ gandharvāpsarasām api | [Rām, Utt, 61 13.2]
tam avajñāya tu hataṃ śatrughnaṃ bhuvi pātitam | [Rām, Utt, 61 14.1]
rakṣo labdhāntaram api na viveśa svam ālayam | [Rām, Utt, 61 14.2]
nāpi śūlaṃ prajagrāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam | [Rām, Utt, 61 15.1]
tato hata iti jñātvā tān bhakṣān samudāvahat | [Rām, Utt, 61 15.2]
muhūrtāllabdhasaṃjñastu punastasthau dhṛtāyudhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 16.1]
śatrughno rākṣasadvāri ṛṣibhiḥ samprapūjitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 16.2]
tato divyam amoghaṃ taṃ jagrāha śaram uttamam | [Rām, Utt, 61 17.1]
jvalantaṃ tejasā ghoraṃ pūrayantaṃ diśo daśa | [Rām, Utt, 61 17.2]
vajrānanaṃ vajravegaṃ merumandaragauravam | [Rām, Utt, 61 18.1]
nataṃ parvasu sarveṣu saṃyugeṣvaparājitam | [Rām, Utt, 61 18.2]
asṛkcandanadigdhāṅgaṃ cārupatraṃ patatriṇam | [Rām, Utt, 61 19.1]
dānavendrācalendrāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca dāruṇam | [Rām, Utt, 61 19.2]
taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ yugānte samupasthite | [Rām, Utt, 61 20.1]
dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni paritrāsam upāgaman | [Rām, Utt, 61 20.2]
sadevāsuragandharvaṃ samuniṃ sāpsarogaṇam | [Rām, Utt, 61 21.1]
jagaddhi sarvam asvasthaṃ pitāmaham upasthitam | [Rām, Utt, 61 21.2]
ūcuśca devadeveśaṃ varadaṃ prapitāmaham | [Rām, Utt, 61 22.1]
kaccil lokakṣayo deva prāpto vā yugasaṃkṣayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 22.2]
nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na śrutaṃ vā prapitāmaha | [Rām, Utt, 61 23.1]
devānāṃ bhayasaṃmoho lokānāṃ saṃkṣayaḥ prabho | [Rām, Utt, 61 23.2]
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 24.1]
bhayakāraṇam ācaṣṭe devānām abhayaṃkaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 24.2]
vadhāya lavaṇasyājau śaraḥ śatrughnadhāritaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 25.1]
tejasā yasya sarve sma saṃmūḍhāḥ surasattamāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 25.2]
eṣo hi pūrvaṃ devasya lokakartuḥ sanātanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 26.1]
śarastejomayo vatsā yena vai bhayam āgatam | [Rām, Utt, 61 26.2]
eṣa vai kaiṭabhasyārthe madhunaśca mahāśaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 27.1]
sṛṣṭo mahātmanā tena vadhārthaṃ daityayostayoḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 27.2]
evam etaṃ prajānīdhvaṃ viṣṇostejomayaṃ śaram | [Rām, Utt, 61 28.1]
eṣā caiva tanuḥ pūrvā viṣṇostasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 28.2]
ito gacchata paśyadhvaṃ vadhyamānaṃ mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 61 29.1]
rāmānujena vīreṇa lavaṇaṃ rākṣasottamam | [Rām, Utt, 61 29.2]
tasya te devadevasya niśamya madhurāṃ giram | [Rām, Utt, 61 30.1]
ājagmur yatra yudhyete śatrughnalavaṇāvubhau | [Rām, Utt, 61 30.2]
taṃ śaraṃ divyasaṃkāśaṃ śatrughnakaradhāritam | [Rām, Utt, 61 31.1]
dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni yugāntāgnim ivotthitam | [Rām, Utt, 61 31.2]
ākāśam āvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā devair hi raghunandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 32.1]
siṃhanādaṃ muhuḥ kṛtvā dadarśa lavaṇaṃ punaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 32.2]
āhūtaśca tatastena śatrughnena mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 61 33.1]
lavaṇaḥ krodhasaṃyukto yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 33.2]
ā karṇāt sa vikṛṣyātha tad dhanur dhanvināṃ varaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 34.1]
sa mumoca mahābāṇaṃ lavaṇasya mahorasi | [Rām, Utt, 61 34.2]
urastasya vidāryāśu praviveśa rasātalam | [Rām, Utt, 61 34.3]
gatvā rasātalaṃ divyaṃ śaro vibudhapūjitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 35.1]
punar evāgamat tūrṇam ikṣvākukulanandanam | [Rām, Utt, 61 35.2]
śatrughnaśaranirbhinno lavaṇaḥ sa niśācaraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 36.1]
papāta sahasā bhūmau vajrāhata ivācalaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 36.2]
tacca divyaṃ mahacchūlaṃ hate lavaṇarākṣase | [Rām, Utt, 61 37.1]
paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ rudrasya vaśam anvagāt | [Rām, Utt, 61 37.2]
ekeṣupātena bhayaṃ nihatya lokatrayasyāsya raghupravīraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 38.1]
vinirbabhāvudyatacāpabāṇas tamaḥ praṇudyeva sahasraraśmiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 61 38.2]
{Rām, Utt, 62}
hate tu lavaṇe devāḥ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 1.1]
ūcuḥ sumadhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śatrughnaṃ śatrutāpanam | [Rām, Utt, 62 1.2]
diṣṭyā te vijayo vatsa diṣṭyā lavaṇarākṣasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 2.1]
hataḥ puruṣaśārdūla varaṃ varaya rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 62 2.2]
varadāḥ sma mahābāho sarva eva samāgatāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 3.1]
vijayākāṅkṣiṇastubhyam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ hi naḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 3.2]
devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śūro mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 4.1]
pratyuvāca mahābāhuḥ śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān | [Rām, Utt, 62 4.2]
imāṃ madhupurīṃ ramyāṃ madhurāṃ devanirmitām | [Rām, Utt, 62 5.1]
niveśaṃ prāpnuyāṃ śīghram eṣa me 'stu varo mataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 5.2]
taṃ devāḥ prītamanaso bāḍham ityeva rāghavam | [Rām, Utt, 62 6.1]
bhaviṣyati purī ramyā śūrasenā na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 6.2]
te tathoktvā mahātmāno divam āruruhustadā | [Rām, Utt, 62 7.1]
śatrughno 'pi mahātejāstāṃ senāṃ samupānayat | [Rām, Utt, 62 7.2]
sā senā śīghram āgacchacchrutvā śatrughnaśāsanam | [Rām, Utt, 62 8.1]
niveśanaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ śāsanena samārabhat | [Rām, Utt, 62 8.2]
sā purī divyasaṃkāśā varṣe dvādaśame śubhā | [Rām, Utt, 62 9.1]
niviṣṭā śūrasenānāṃ viṣayaścākutobhayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 9.2]
kṣetrāṇi sasyayuktāni kāle varṣati vāsavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 10.1]
arogā vīrapuruṣā śatrughnabhujapālitā | [Rām, Utt, 62 10.2]
ardhacandrapratīkāśā yamunātīraśobhitā | [Rām, Utt, 62 11.1]
śobhitā gṛhamukhyaiśca śobhitā catvarāpaṇaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 11.2]
yacca tena mahacchūnyaṃ lavaṇena kṛtaṃ purā | [Rām, Utt, 62 12.1]
śobhayāmāsa tad vīro nānāpaṇyasamṛddhibhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 12.2]
tāṃ samṛddhāṃ samṛddhārthaḥ śatrughno bharatānujaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 62 13.1]
nirīkṣya paramaprītaḥ paraṃ harṣam upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 62 13.2]
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya madhurāṃ purīm | [Rām, Utt, 62 14.1]
rāmapādau nirīkṣeyaṃ varṣe dvādaśame śubhe | [Rām, Utt, 62 14.2]
{Rām, Utt, 63}
tato dvādaśame varṣe śatrughno rāmapālitām | [Rām, Utt, 63 1.1]
ayodhyāṃ cakame gantum alpabhṛtyabalānugaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 63 1.2]
mantriṇo balamukhyāṃśca nivartya ca purodhasaṃ | [Rām, Utt, 63 2.1]
jagāma rathamukhyena hayayuktena bhāsvatā | [Rām, Utt, 63 2.2]
sa gatvā gaṇitān vāsān saptāṣṭau raghunandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 63 3.1]
ayodhyām agamat tūrṇaṃ rāghavotsukadarśanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 63 3.2]
sa praviśya purīṃ ramyāṃ śrīmān ikṣvākunandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 63 4.1]
praviveśa mahābāhur yatra rāmo mahādyutiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 63 4.2]
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā | [Rām, Utt, 63 5.1]
uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā rāmaṃ satyaparākramam | [Rām, Utt, 63 5.2]
yad ājñaptaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān aham | [Rām, Utt, 63 6.1]
hataḥ sa lavaṇaḥ pāpaḥ purī sā ca niveśitā | [Rām, Utt, 63 6.2]
dvādaśaṃ ca gataṃ varṣaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 63 7.1]
notsaheyam ahaṃ vastuṃ tvayā virahito nṛpa | [Rām, Utt, 63 7.2]
sa me prasādaṃ kākutstha kuruṣvāmitavikrama | [Rām, Utt, 63 8.1]
mātṛhīno yathā vatsastvāṃ vinā pravasāmyaham | [Rām, Utt, 63 8.2]
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ śatrughnaṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 63 9.1]
mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vīra naitat kṣatriyaceṣṭitam | [Rām, Utt, 63 9.2]
nāvasīdanti rājāno vipravāseṣu rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 63 10.1]
prajāśca paripālyā hi kṣatradharmeṇa rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 63 10.2]
kāle kāle ca māṃ vīra ayodhyām avalokitum | [Rām, Utt, 63 11.1]
āgaccha tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gantāsi ca puraṃ tava | [Rām, Utt, 63 11.2]
mamāpi tvaṃ sudayitaḥ prāṇair api na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 63 12.1]
avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca rājyasya paripālanam | [Rām, Utt, 63 12.2]
tasmāt tvaṃ vasa kākutstha pañcarātraṃ mayā saha | [Rām, Utt, 63 13.1]
ūrdhvaṃ gantāsi madhurāṃ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 63 13.2]
rāmasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā dharmayuktaṃ mano'nugam | [Rām, Utt, 63 14.1]
śatrughno dīnayā vācā bāḍham ityeva cābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 63 14.2]
sa pañcarātraṃ kākutstho rāghavasya yathājñayā | [Rām, Utt, 63 15.1]
uṣya tatra maheṣvāso gamanāyopacakrame | [Rām, Utt, 63 15.2]
āmantrya tu mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam | [Rām, Utt, 63 16.1]
bharataṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva mahāratham upāruhat | [Rām, Utt, 63 16.2]
dūraṃ tābhyām anugato lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 63 17.1]
bharatena ca śatrughno jagāmāśu purīṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 63 17.2]
{Rām, Utt, 64}
prasthāpya tu sa śatrughnaṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 1.1]
pramumoda sukhī rājyaṃ dharmeṇa paripālayan | [Rām, Utt, 64 1.2]
tataḥ katipayāhaḥsu vṛddho jānapado dvijaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 2.1]
śavaṃ bālam upādāya rājadvāram upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 64 2.2]
rudan bahuvidhā vācaḥ snehākṣarasamanvitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 3.1]
asakṛt putra putreti vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 64 3.2]
kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma pūrvaṃ dehāntare kṛtam | [Rām, Utt, 64 4.1]
yad ahaṃ putram ekaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi nidhanaṃ gatam | [Rām, Utt, 64 4.2]
aprāptayauvanaṃ bālaṃ pañcavarṣasamanvitam | [Rām, Utt, 64 5.1]
akāle kālam āpannaṃ duḥkhāya mama putraka | [Rām, Utt, 64 5.2]
alpair ahobhir nidhanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 6.1]
ahaṃ ca jananī caiva tava śokena putraka | [Rām, Utt, 64 6.2]
na smarāmyanṛtaṃ hyuktaṃ na ca hiṃsāṃ smarāmyaham | [Rām, Utt, 64 7.1]
kena me duṣkṛtenādya bāla eva mamātmajaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 7.2]
akṛtvā pitṛkāryāṇi nīto vaivasvatakṣayam | [Rām, Utt, 64 7.3]
nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ me śrutaṃ vā ghoradarśanam | [Rām, Utt, 64 8.1]
mṛtyur aprāptakālānāṃ rāmasya viṣaye yathā | [Rām, Utt, 64 8.2]
rāmasya duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcinmahad asti na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 9.1]
tvaṃ rājañjīvayasvainaṃ bālaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam | [Rām, Utt, 64 9.2]
bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi | [Rām, Utt, 64 10.1]
uṣitāḥ sma sukhaṃ rājye tavāsmin sumahābala | [Rām, Utt, 64 10.2]
saṃpratyanātho viṣaya ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām | [Rām, Utt, 64 11.1]
rāmaṃ nātham ihāsādya bālāntakaraṇaṃ nṛpam | [Rām, Utt, 64 11.2]
rājadoṣair vipadyante prajā hyavidhipālitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 12.1]
asadvṛtte tu nṛpatāvakāle mriyate janaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 12.2]
yadā pureṣvayuktāni janā janapadeṣu ca | [Rām, Utt, 64 13.1]
kurvate na ca rakṣāsti tadākālakṛtaṃ bhayam | [Rām, Utt, 64 13.2]
savyaktaṃ rājadoṣo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 14.1]
pure janapade vāpi tadā bālavadho hyayam | [Rām, Utt, 64 14.2]
evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair nindayāno muhur muhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 64 15.1]
rājānaṃ duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sutaṃ tam upagūhati | [Rām, Utt, 64 15.2]
{Rām, Utt, 65}
tathā tu karuṇaṃ tasya dvijasya paridevitam | [Rām, Utt, 65 1.1]
śuśrāva rāghavaḥ sarvaṃ duḥkhaśokasamanvitam | [Rām, Utt, 65 1.2]
sa duḥkhena susaṃtapto mantriṇaḥ samupāhvayat | [Rām, Utt, 65 2.1]
vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca bhrātṝṃśca sahanaigamān | [Rām, Utt, 65 2.2]
tato dvijā vasiṣṭhena sārdham aṣṭau praveśitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 3.1]
rājānaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ vardhasveti tato 'bruvan | [Rām, Utt, 65 3.2]

kātyāyano 'tha jābālir gautamo nāradastathā | [Rām, Utt, 65 4.2]
ete dvijarṣabhāḥ sarve āsaneṣūpaveśitāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 5.1]

raghavaḥ sarvam ācaṣṭe dvijo yasmāt praroditi | [Rām, Utt, 65 6.2]
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājño dīnasya nāradaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 7.1]
pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau nṛpam | [Rām, Utt, 65 7.2]
śṛṇu rājan yathākāle prāpto 'yaṃ bālasaṃkṣayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 8.1]
śrutvā kartavyatāṃ vīra kuruṣva raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 65 8.2]
purā kṛtayuge rāma brāhmaṇā vai tapasvinaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 9.1]
abrāhmaṇastadā rājanna tapasvī kathaṃcana | [Rām, Utt, 65 9.2]
tasmin yuge prajvalite brahmabhūte anāvṛte | [Rām, Utt, 65 10.1]
amṛtyavastadā sarve jajñire dīrghadarśinaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 10.2]
tatastretāyugaṃ nāma mānavānāṃ vapuṣmatām | [Rām, Utt, 65 11.1]

vīryeṇa tapasā caiva te 'dhikāḥ pūrvajanmani | [Rām, Utt, 65 12.1]
mānavā ye mahātmānastasmiṃstretāyuge yuge | [Rām, Utt, 65 12.2]

yugayor ubhayor āsīt samavīryasamanvitam | [Rām, Utt, 65 13.2]
apaśyantastu te sarve viśeṣam adhikaṃ tataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 14.1]
sthāpanaṃ cakrire tatra cāturvarṇyasya sarvataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 14.2]
adharmaḥ pādam ekaṃ tu pātayat pṛthivītale | [Rām, Utt, 65 15.1]
adharmeṇa hi saṃyuktāstena mandābhavan dvijāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 15.2]
tataḥ prāduṣkṛtaṃ pūrvam āyuṣaḥ pariniṣṭhitam | [Rām, Utt, 65 16.1]
śubhānyevācaraṃllokāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 16.2]
tretāyuge tvavartanta brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyaśca ye | [Rām, Utt, 65 17.1]
tapo 'tapyanta te sarve śuśrūṣām apare janāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 17.2]
sa dharmaḥ paramasteṣāṃ vaiśyaśūdram athāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 65 18.1]
pūjāṃ ca sarvavarṇānāṃ śūdrāścakrur viśeṣataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 18.2]
tataḥ pādam adharmasya dvitīyam avatārayat | [Rām, Utt, 65 19.1]
tato dvāparasaṃkhyā sā yugasya samajāyata | [Rām, Utt, 65 19.2]
tasmin dvāparasaṃkhye tu vartamāne yugakṣaye | [Rām, Utt, 65 20.1]
adharmaścānṛtaṃ caiva vavṛdhe puruṣarṣabha | [Rām, Utt, 65 20.2]
tasmin dvāparasaṃkhyāte tapo vaiśyān samāviśat | [Rām, Utt, 65 21.1]
na śūdro labhate dharmam ugraṃ taptaṃ nararṣabha | [Rām, Utt, 65 21.2]
hīnavarṇo naraśreṣṭha tapyate sumahat tapaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 22.1]
bhaviṣyā śūdrayonyāṃ hi tapaścaryā kalau yuge | [Rām, Utt, 65 22.2]
adharmaḥ paramo rāma dvāpare śūdradhāritaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 23.1]
sa vai viṣayaparyante tava rājanmahātapāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 23.2]
śūdrastapyati durbuddhistena bālavadho hyayam | [Rām, Utt, 65 23.3]
yo hyadharmam akāryaṃ vā viṣaye pārthivasya hi | [Rām, Utt, 65 24.1]
karoti rājaśārdūla pure vā durmatir naraḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 24.2]
kṣipraṃ hi narakaṃ yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 65 24.3]
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla mārgasva viṣayaṃ svakam | [Rām, Utt, 65 25.1]

{Rām, Utt, 66}
nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā | [Rām, Utt, 66 1.1]
praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 66 1.2]

bhāṣitaṃ ruciraṃ śrutvā puṣpakasya narādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 66 8.1]
abhivādya maharṣīṃstān vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata | [Rām, Utt, 66 8.2]
dhanur gṛhītvā tūṇīṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca ruciraprabham | [Rām, Utt, 66 9.1]
nikṣipya nagare vīrau saumitribharatāvubhau | [Rām, Utt, 66 9.2]
prāyāt pratīcīṃ sa marūn vicinvaṃśca samantataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 66 10.1]

tasmin sarasi tapyantaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahat tapaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 66 13.1]

uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ dhanyastvam asi suvrata | [Rām, Utt, 66 14.2]
kasyāṃ yonyāṃ tapovṛddha vartase dṛḍhavikrama | [Rām, Utt, 66 15.1]

yam āśritya tapastaptaṃ śrotum icchāmi tāpasa | [Rām, Utt, 66 16.2]
brāhmaṇo vāsi bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vāsi durjayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 66 17.1]

{Rām, Utt, 67}
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 67 1.1]
avākśirāstathābhūto vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 67 1.2]
śūdrayonyāṃ prasūto 'smi tapa ugraṃ samāsthitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 67 2.1]
devatvaṃ prārthaye rāma saśarīro mahāyaśaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 67 2.2]

āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi nidhiḥ paramako bhavān | [Rām, Utt, 67 17.2]
evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe munir vākyam athābravīt | [Rām, Utt, 67 18.1]

{Rām, Utt, 68}
purā tretāyuge hyāsīd araṇyaṃ bahuvistaram | [Rām, Utt, 68 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 69}
śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ mama rāma śubhākṣaram | [Rām, Utt, 69 1.1]
prāñjaliḥ pratyuvācedaṃ sa svargī raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 69 1.2]
śṛṇu brahman yathāvṛttaṃ mamaitat sukhaduḥkhayoḥ | [Rām, Utt, 69 2.1]
duratikramaṇīyaṃ hi yathā pṛcchasi māṃ dvija | [Rām, Utt, 69 2.2]

sudeva iti vikhyātastriṣu lokeṣu vīryavān | [Rām, Utt, 69 3.2]

evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi samatītāni suvrata | [Rām, Utt, 69 6.1]

idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapastaptaṃ mayā ciram | [Rām, Utt, 69 9.2]
so 'haṃ varṣasahasrāṇi tapastrīṇi mahāmune | [Rām, Utt, 69 10.1]

pitāmahastu mām āha tavāhāraḥ sudevaja | [Rām, Utt, 69 14.1]
svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 69 14.2]

sa tvaṃ supuṣṭam āhāraiḥ svaśarīram anuttamam | [Rām, Utt, 69 17.1]
bhakṣayasvāmṛtarasaṃ sā te tṛptir bhaviṣyati | [Rām, Utt, 69 17.2]

sa hi tārayituṃ saumya śaktaḥ suragaṇān api | [Rām, Utt, 69 19.1]

so 'haṃ bhagavataḥ śrutvā devadevasya niścayam | [Rām, Utt, 69 20.1]
āhāraṃ garhitaṃ kurmi svaśarīraṃ dvijottama | [Rām, Utt, 69 20.2]
bahūn varṣagaṇān brahman bhujyamānam idaṃ mayā | [Rām, Utt, 69 21.1]

tasya me kṛcchrabhūtasya kṛcchrād asmād vimokṣaya | [Rām, Utt, 69 22.1]
anyeṣām agatir hyatra kumbhayonim ṛte dvijam | [Rām, Utt, 69 22.2]

{Rām, Utt, 70}

nāma tasya ca daṇḍeti pitā cakre 'lpatejasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 70 15.1]

{Rām, Utt, 71}
etad ākhyāya rāmāya maharṣiḥ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 71 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 72}
sa muhūrtād upaśrutya devarṣir amitaprabhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 72 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 73}
ṛṣer vacanam ājñāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsitum | [Rām, Utt, 73 1.1]

draṣṭuṃ caivāgamiṣyāmi pāvanārtham ihātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 73 7.2]

uvāca paramaprīto dharmanetrastapodhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 73 8.2]

{Rām, Utt, 74}
tacchrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 74 1.1]
dvāḥsthaḥ kumārāvāhūya rāghavāya nyavedayat | [Rām, Utt, 74 1.2]
dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau | [Rām, Utt, 74 2.1]

hitaṃ cāyatiyuktaṃ ca prayatau vaktum arhathaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 74 7.2]
śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 74 8.1]
bharataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 74 8.2]
tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā | [Rām, Utt, 74 9.1]
pratiṣṭhitā mahābāho yaśaścāmitavikrama | [Rām, Utt, 74 9.2]

sarveṣāṃ bhavitā tatra kṣayaḥ sarvāntakopamaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 74 13.2]
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla guṇair atulavikrama | [Rām, Utt, 74 14.1]
pṛthivīṃ nārhase hantuṃ vaśe hi tava vartate | [Rām, Utt, 74 14.2]
bharatasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā | [Rām, Utt, 74 15.1]
praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 74 15.2]
uvāca ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ kaikeyyā nandivardhanam | [Rām, Utt, 74 16.1]
prīto 'smi parituṣṭo 'smi tavādya vacanena hi | [Rām, Utt, 74 16.2]
idaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ tvayā dharmasamāhitam | [Rām, Utt, 74 17.1]
vyāhṛtaṃ puruṣavyāghra pṛthivyāḥ paripālanam | [Rām, Utt, 74 17.2]
eṣa tasmād abhiprāyād rājasūyāt kratūttamāt | [Rām, Utt, 74 18.1]
nivartayāmi dharmajña tava suvyāhṛtena vai | [Rām, Utt, 74 18.2]

{Rām, Utt, 75}

{Rām, Utt, 77}

{Rām, Utt, 79}
tāṃ kathām ilasambaddhāṃ rāmeṇa samudīritām | [Rām, Utt, 79 1.1]

nopalebhe tadātmānaṃ cacāla ca tadāmbhasi | [Rām, Utt, 79 12.2]

sadṛśīyaṃ mama bhaved yadi nānyaparigrahā | [Rām, Utt, 79 15.1]
iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya jalāt sthalam upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 79 15.2]
sa āśramaṃ samupāgamya catasraḥ pramadāstataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 79 16.1]
śabdāpayata dharmātmā tāścainaṃ ca vavandire | [Rām, Utt, 79 16.2]
sa tāḥ papraccha dharmātmā kasyaiṣā lokasundarī | [Rām, Utt, 79 17.1]
kimartham āgatā ceha satyam ākhyāta māciram | [Rām, Utt, 79 17.2]
śubhaṃ tu tasya tadvākyaṃ madhuraṃ madhurākṣaram | [Rām, Utt, 79 18.1]
śrutvā tu tāḥ striyaḥ sarvā ūcur madhurayā girā | [Rām, Utt, 79 18.2]
asmākam eṣā suśroṇī prabhutve vartate sadā | [Rām, Utt, 79 19.1]
apatiḥ kānanānteṣu sahāsmābhir aṭatyasau | [Rām, Utt, 79 19.2]

so 'rthaṃ viditvā nikhilaṃ tasya rājño yathāgatam | [Rām, Utt, 79 21.1]

vatsyathāsmin girau yūyam avakāśo vidhīyatām | [Rām, Utt, 79 22.2]
mūlapatraphalaiḥ sarvā vartayiṣyatha nityadā | [Rām, Utt, 79 23.1]
striyaḥ kimpuruṣānnāma bhartṝn samupalapsyatha | [Rām, Utt, 79 23.2]
tāḥ śrutvā somaputrasya vācaṃ kiṃpuruṣīkṛtāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 79 24.1]

{Rām, Utt, 80}
śrutvā kimpuruṣotpattiṃ lakṣmaṇo bharatastadā | [Rām, Utt, 80 1.1]
āścaryam iti cābrūtām ubhau rāmaṃ janeśvaram | [Rām, Utt, 80 1.2]

sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvasto mahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 80 15.1]

suto dharmaparo brahmañjyeṣṭho mama mahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 80 17.1]

{Rām, Utt, 81}

{Rām, Utt, 82}

{Rām, Utt, 83}
tat sarvam akhilenāśu prasthāpya bharatāgrajaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 83 1.1]

{Rām, Utt, 84}
vartamāne tathābhūte yajñe paramake 'dbhute | [Rām, Utt, 84 1.1]

dharme prayatamānasya vyatīyād rāghavasya tu | [Rām, Utt, 89 7.2]
ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi sthitā rāmasya śāsane | [Rām, Utt, 89 8.1]
anurajyanti rājāno 'hanyahani rāghavam | [Rām, Utt, 89 8.2]
kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣaṃ vimalā diśaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 89 9.1]
hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ puraṃ janapadastathā | [Rām, Utt, 89 9.2]
nākāle mriyate kaścinna vyādhiḥ prāṇināṃ tadā | [Rām, Utt, 89 10.1]
nādharmaścābhavat kaścid rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati | [Rām, Utt, 89 10.2]
atha dīrghasya kālasya rāmamātā yaśasvinī | [Rām, Utt, 89 11.1]
putrapautraiḥ parivṛtā kāladharmam upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 89 11.2]
anviyāya sumitrāpi kaikeyī ca yaśasvinī | [Rām, Utt, 89 12.1]
dharmaṃ kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tridive paryavasthitā | [Rām, Utt, 89 12.2]
sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca | [Rām, Utt, 89 13.1]
samāgatā mahābhāgāḥ saha dharmaṃ ca lebhire | [Rām, Utt, 89 13.2]
tāsāṃ rāmo mahādānaṃ kāle kāle prayacchati | [Rām, Utt, 89 14.1]
mātṝṇām aviśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu | [Rām, Utt, 89 14.2]
pitryāṇi bahuratnāni yajñān paramadustarān | [Rām, Utt, 89 15.1]
cakāra rāmo dharmātmā pitṝn devān vivardhayan | [Rām, Utt, 89 15.2]
{Rām, Utt, 90}
kasyacittvatha kālasya yudhājit kekayo nṛpaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 1.1]
svaguruṃ preṣayāmāsa rāghavāya mahātmane | [Rām, Utt, 90 1.2]
gārgyam aṅgirasaḥ putraṃ brahmarṣim amitaprabham | [Rām, Utt, 90 2.1]
daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi prītidānam anuttamam | [Rām, Utt, 90 2.2]
kambalāni ca ratnāni citravastram athottamam | [Rām, Utt, 90 3.1]
rāmāya pradadau rājā bahūnyābharaṇāni ca | [Rām, Utt, 90 3.2]
śrutvā tu rāghavo gārgyaṃ maharṣiṃ samupāgatam | [Rām, Utt, 90 4.1]
mātulasyāśvapatinaḥ priyaṃ dūtam upāgatam | [Rām, Utt, 90 4.2]
pratyudgamya ca kākutsthaḥ krośamātraṃ sahānugaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 5.1]
gārgyaṃ saṃpūjayāmāsa dhanaṃ tat pratigṛhya ca | [Rām, Utt, 90 5.2]

yudhājit prītisaṃyuktaṃ śrūyatāṃ yadi rocate | [Rām, Utt, 90 9.2]
ayaṃ gandharvaviṣayaḥ phalamūlopaśobhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 10.1]
sindhor ubhayataḥ pārśve deśaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 10.2]
taṃ ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sāyudhā yuddhakovidāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 11.1]
śailūṣasya sutā vīrāstisraḥ koṭyo mahābalāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 11.2]

niveśaya mahābāho dve pure susamāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 12.2]
anyasya na gatistatra deśaścāyaṃ suśobhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 13.1]
rocatāṃ te mahābāho nāhaṃ tvām anṛtaṃ vade | [Rām, Utt, 90 13.2]
tacchrutvā rāghavaḥ prīto maharṣermātulasya ca | [Rām, Utt, 90 14.1]
uvāca bāḍham ityevaṃ bharataṃ cānvavaikṣata | [Rām, Utt, 90 14.2]
so 'bravīd rāghavaḥ prītaḥ prāñjalipragraho dvijam | [Rām, Utt, 90 15.1]
imau kumārau taṃ deśaṃ brahmarṣe vijayiṣyataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 15.2]
bharatasyātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkala eva ca | [Rām, Utt, 90 16.1]
mātulena suguptau tau dharmeṇa ca samāhitau | [Rām, Utt, 90 16.2]
bharataṃ cāgrataḥ kṛtvā kumārau sabalānugau | [Rām, Utt, 90 17.1]
nihatya gandharvasutān dve pure vibhajiṣyataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 17.2]
niveśya te puravare ātmajau saṃniveśya ca | [Rām, Utt, 90 18.1]
āgamiṣyati me bhūyaḥ sakāśam atidhārmikaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 18.2]
brahmarṣim evam uktvā tu bharataṃ sabalānugam | [Rām, Utt, 90 19.1]
ājñāpayāmāsa tadā kumārau cābhyaṣecayat | [Rām, Utt, 90 19.2]
nakṣatreṇa ca saumyena puraskṛtyāṅgiraḥsutam | [Rām, Utt, 90 20.1]
bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyāṃ ca niryayau | [Rām, Utt, 90 20.2]
sā senā śakrayukteva nagarānniryayāvatha | [Rām, Utt, 90 21.1]
rāghavānugatā dūraṃ durādharṣā surāsuraiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 21.2]
māṃsāśīni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi sumahānti ca | [Rām, Utt, 90 22.1]
anujagmuśca bharataṃ rudhirasya pipāsayā | [Rām, Utt, 90 22.2]
bhūtagrāmāśca bahavo māṃsabhakṣāḥ sudāruṇāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 23.1]
gandharvaputramāṃsāni bhoktukāmāḥ sahasraśaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 23.2]
siṃhavyāghrasṛgālānāṃ khecarāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇām | [Rām, Utt, 90 24.1]
bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyā yayur agrataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 90 24.2]
adhyardhamāsam uṣitā pathi senā nirāmayā | [Rām, Utt, 90 25.1]

{Rām, Utt, 91}
śrutvā senāpatiṃ prāptaṃ bharataṃ kekayādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 91 1.1]
yudhājid gārgyasahitaṃ parāṃ prītim upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 91 1.2]
sa niryayau janaughena mahatā kekayādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 91 2.1]
tvaramāṇo 'bhicakrāma gandharvān devarūpiṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 91 2.2]

kṣaṇenābhihatāstisrastatra koṭyo mahātmanā | [Rām, Utt, 91 7.2]
taṃ ghātaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ na smaranti divaukasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 91 8.1]
nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tādṛśānāṃ mahātmanām | [Rām, Utt, 91 8.2]
hateṣu teṣu vīreṣu bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 91 9.1]
niveśayāmāsa tadā samṛddhe dve purottame | [Rām, Utt, 91 9.2]
takṣaṃ takṣaśilāyāṃ tu puṣkaraṃ puṣkarāvatau | [Rām, Utt, 91 9.3]
gandharvadeśo ruciro gāndhāraviṣayaśca saḥ | [Rām, Utt, 91 10.1]

{Rām, Utt, 92}
tacchrutvā harṣam āpede rāghavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha | [Rām, Utt, 92 1.1]
vākyaṃ cādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ bhrātṝn provāca rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 92 1.2]
imau kumārau saumitre tava dharmaviśāradau | [Rām, Utt, 92 2.1]
aṅgadaścandraketuśca rājyārhau dṛḍhadhanvinau | [Rām, Utt, 92 2.2]

ramaṇīyo hyasaṃbādho rametāṃ yatra dhanvinau | [Rām, Utt, 92 3.2]
na rājñāṃ yatra pīḍā syānnāśramāṇāṃ vināśanam | [Rām, Utt, 92 4.1]

tathoktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 92 5.1]
ayaṃ kārāpatho deśaḥ suramaṇyo nirāmayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 92 5.2]
niveśyatāṃ tatra puram aṅgadasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 92 6.1]
candraketośca ruciraṃ candrakāntaṃ nirāmayam | [Rām, Utt, 92 6.2]
tad vākyaṃ bharatenoktaṃ pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 92 7.1]
taṃ ca kṛtvā vaśe deśam aṅgadasya nyaveśayat | [Rām, Utt, 92 7.2]
aṅgadīyā purī ramyā aṅgadasya niveśitā | [Rām, Utt, 92 8.1]
ramaṇīyā suguptā ca rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā | [Rām, Utt, 92 8.2]
candraketostu mallasya mallabhūmyāṃ niveśitā | [Rām, Utt, 92 9.1]
candrakānteti vikhyātā divyā svargapurī yathā | [Rām, Utt, 92 9.2]

yayur yudhi durādharṣā abhiṣekaṃ ca cakrire | [Rām, Utt, 92 10.2]

ubhau saumitribharatau rāmapādāvanuvratau | [Rām, Utt, 92 15.1]
kālaṃ gatam api snehānna jajñāte 'tidhārmikau | [Rām, Utt, 92 15.2]

dharme prayatamānānāṃ paurakāryeṣu nityadā | [Rām, Utt, 92 16.2]

trayaḥ samiddhā iva dīptatejasā hutāgnayaḥ sādhu mahādhvare trayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 92 17.2]
{Rām, Utt, 93}
kasyacittvatha kālasya rāme dharmapathe sthite | [Rām, Utt, 93 1.1]
kālastāpasarūpeṇa rājadvāram upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 93 1.2]
so 'bravīllakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ dhṛtimantaṃ yaśasvinam | [Rām, Utt, 93 2.1]
māṃ nivedaya rāmāya samprāptaṃ kāryagauravāt | [Rām, Utt, 93 2.2]
dūto hyatibalasyāhaṃ maharṣer amitaujasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 3.1]
rāmaṃ didṛkṣur āyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahābala | [Rām, Utt, 93 3.2]
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitristvarayānvitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 4.1]
nyavedayata rāmāya tāpasasya vivakṣitam | [Rām, Utt, 93 4.2]
jayasva rājan dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahādyute | [Rām, Utt, 93 5.1]
dūtastvāṃ draṣṭum āyātastapasvī bhāskaraprabhaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 5.2]
tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ śrutvā rāma uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 93 6.1]
praveśyatāṃ munistāta mahaujāstasya vākyadhṛk | [Rām, Utt, 93 6.2]
saumitristu tathetyuktvā prāveśayata taṃ munim | [Rām, Utt, 93 7.1]
jvalantam iva tejobhiḥ pradahantam ivāṃśubhiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 7.2]
so 'bhigamya raghuśreṣṭhaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā | [Rām, Utt, 93 8.1]
ṛṣir madhurayā vācā vardhasvetyāha rāghavam | [Rām, Utt, 93 8.2]
tasmai rāmo mahātejāḥ pūjām arghyapurogamām | [Rām, Utt, 93 9.1]
dadau kuśalam avyagraṃ praṣṭuṃ caivopacakrame | [Rām, Utt, 93 9.2]
pṛṣṭaśca kuśalaṃ tena rāmeṇa vadatāṃ varaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 10.1]
āsane kāñcane divye niṣasāda mahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 10.2]
tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ svāgataṃ te mahāmune | [Rām, Utt, 93 11.1]

tatheti ca pratijñāya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 93 14.1]
dvāri tiṣṭha mahābāho pratihāraṃ visarjaya | [Rām, Utt, 93 14.2]
sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathāṃ dvandvasamīritām | [Rām, Utt, 93 15.1]
ṛṣer mama ca saumitre paśyed vā śṛṇuyācca yaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 15.2]
tato nikṣipya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ dvārasaṃgrahe | [Rām, Utt, 93 16.1]
tam uvāca muniṃ vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 16.2]
yat te manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vāsi samāhitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 93 17.1]
kathayasva viśaṅkastvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate | [Rām, Utt, 93 17.2]
{Rām, Utt, 94}
śṛṇu rāma mahābāho yadartham aham āgataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 1.1]
pitāmahena devena preṣito 'smi mahābala | [Rām, Utt, 94 1.2]
tavāhaṃ pūrvake bhāve putraḥ parapuraṃjaya | [Rām, Utt, 94 2.1]
māyāsaṃbhāvito vīra kālaḥ sarvasamāharaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 2.2]
pitāmahaśca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 3.1]
samayaste mahābāho svarlokān parirakṣitum | [Rām, Utt, 94 3.2]
saṃkṣipya ca purā lokānmāyayā svayam eva hi | [Rām, Utt, 94 4.1]
mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvam ajījanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 4.2]
bhogavantaṃ tato nāgam anantam udake śayam | [Rām, Utt, 94 5.1]
māyayā janayitvā tvaṃ dvau ca sattvau mahābalau | [Rām, Utt, 94 5.2]
madhuṃ ca kaiṭabhaṃ caiva yayor asthicayair vṛtā | [Rām, Utt, 94 6.1]
iyaṃ parvatasaṃbādhā medinī cābhavanmahī | [Rām, Utt, 94 6.2]
padme divyārkasaṃkāśe nābhyām utpādya mām api | [Rām, Utt, 94 7.1]
prājāpatyaṃ tvayā karma sarvaṃ mayi niveśitam | [Rām, Utt, 94 7.2]
so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim | [Rām, Utt, 94 8.1]
rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaskaro bhavān | [Rām, Utt, 94 8.2]
tatastvam api durdharṣastasmād bhāvāt sanātanāt | [Rām, Utt, 94 9.1]
rakṣārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viṣṇutvam upajagmivān | [Rām, Utt, 94 9.2]
adityāṃ vīryavān putro bhrātṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 10.1]
samutpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu lokasāhyāya kalpase | [Rām, Utt, 94 10.2]
sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara | [Rām, Utt, 94 11.1]
rāvaṇasya vadhākāṅkṣī mānuṣeṣu mano 'dadhāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 11.2]
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca | [Rām, Utt, 94 12.1]
kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayam evātmanaḥ purā | [Rām, Utt, 94 12.2]
sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyur mānuṣeṣviha | [Rām, Utt, 94 13.1]
kālo naravaraśreṣṭha samīpam upavartitum | [Rām, Utt, 94 13.2]
yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasyupāsitum | [Rām, Utt, 94 14.1]
vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ te evam āha pitāmahaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 14.2]
atha vā vijigīṣā te suralokāya rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 94 15.1]
sanāthā viṣṇunā devā bhavantu vigatajvarāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 15.2]
śrutvā pitāmahenoktaṃ vākyaṃ kālasamīritam | [Rām, Utt, 94 16.1]
rāghavaḥ prahasan vākyaṃ sarvasaṃhāram abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 94 16.2]
śrutaṃ me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramam adbhutam | [Rām, Utt, 94 17.1]
prītir hi mahatī jātā tavāgamanasaṃbhavā | [Rām, Utt, 94 17.2]
bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāham āgataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 18.1]

mayā hi sarvakṛtyeṣu devānāṃ vaśavartinām | [Rām, Utt, 94 19.1]
sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāre yathā hyāha pitāmahaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 94 19.2]
{Rām, Utt, 95}
tathā tayoḥ kathayator durvāsā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 1.1]
rāmasya darśanākāṅkṣī rājadvāram upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 95 1.2]
so 'bhigamya ca saumitrim uvāca ṛṣisattamaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 2.1]
rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate | [Rām, Utt, 95 2.2]
munestu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā | [Rām, Utt, 95 3.1]
abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 95 3.2]
kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavan ko vārthaḥ kiṃ karomyaham | [Rām, Utt, 95 4.1]
vyagro hi rāghavo brahmanmuhūrtaṃ vā pratīkṣatām | [Rām, Utt, 95 4.2]
tacchrutvā ṛṣiśārdūlaḥ krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 5.1]
uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā | [Rām, Utt, 95 5.2]
asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya | [Rām, Utt, 95 6.1]
viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā | [Rām, Utt, 95 6.2]
bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 7.1]
na hi śakṣyāmyahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi | [Rām, Utt, 95 7.2]
tacchrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 8.1]
cintayāmāsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam | [Rām, Utt, 95 8.2]
ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūt sarvavināśanam | [Rām, Utt, 95 9.1]
iti buddhyā viniścitya rāghavāya nyavedayat | [Rām, Utt, 95 9.2]
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca | [Rām, Utt, 95 10.1]
niṣpatya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha | [Rām, Utt, 95 10.2]
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā | [Rām, Utt, 95 11.1]
kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata | [Rām, Utt, 95 11.2]
tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhuḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 12.1]
pratyāha rāmaṃ durvāsāḥ śrūyatāṃ dharmavatsala | [Rām, Utt, 95 12.2]
adya varṣasahasrasya samāptir mama rāghava | [Rām, Utt, 95 13.1]
so 'haṃ bhojanam icchāmi yathāsiddhaṃ tavānagha | [Rām, Utt, 95 13.2]
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ rāmo harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 14.1]
bhojanaṃ munimukhyāya yathāsiddham upāharat | [Rām, Utt, 95 14.2]
sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhastad annam amṛtopamam | [Rām, Utt, 95 15.1]
sādhu rāmeti sambhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat | [Rām, Utt, 95 15.2]
tasmin gate mahātejā rāghavaḥ prītamānasaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 16.1]
saṃsmṛtya kālavākyāni tato duḥkham upeyivān | [Rām, Utt, 95 16.2]
duḥkhena ca susaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tad ghoradarśanam | [Rām, Utt, 95 17.1]
avāṅmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha | [Rām, Utt, 95 17.2]
tato buddhyā viniścitya kālavākyāni rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 18.1]
naitad astīti coktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīnmahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 95 18.2]
{Rām, Utt, 96}
avāṅmukham atho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somam ivāplutam | [Rām, Utt, 96 1.1]

vasiṣṭhastu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha | [Rām, Utt, 96 7.2]
dṛṣṭam etanmahābāho kṣayaṃ te lomaharṣaṇam | [Rām, Utt, 96 8.1]
lakṣmaṇena viyogaśca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 8.2]
tyajainaṃ balavān kālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 9.1]

tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokyaṃ sacarācaram | [Rām, Utt, 96 10.1]
sadevarṣigaṇaṃ sarvaṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 10.2]
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla trailokyasyābhipālanam | [Rām, Utt, 96 11.1]
lakṣmaṇasya vadhenādya jagat svasthaṃ kuruṣva ha | [Rām, Utt, 96 11.2]
teṣāṃ tat samavetānāṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasaṃhitam | [Rām, Utt, 96 12.1]
śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 96 12.2]
visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 13.1]
tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam | [Rām, Utt, 96 13.2]
rāmeṇa bhāṣite vākye bāṣpavyākulitekṣaṇaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 14.1]
lakṣmaṇastvaritaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha | [Rām, Utt, 96 14.2]
sa gatvā sarayūtīram upaspṛśya kṛtāñjaliḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 15.1]
nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha | [Rām, Utt, 96 15.2]
anucchvasantaṃ yuktaṃ taṃ saśakrāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 16.1]
devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpair avakiraṃstadā | [Rām, Utt, 96 16.2]
adṛśyaṃ sarvam anujaiḥ saśarīraṃ mahābalam | [Rām, Utt, 96 17.1]
pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakro divaṃ sampraviveśa ha | [Rām, Utt, 96 17.2]
tato viṣṇoścaturbhāgam āgataṃ surasattamāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 96 18.1]
hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve 'pūjayan ṛṣibhiḥ saha | [Rām, Utt, 96 18.2]
{Rām, Utt, 97}
visṛjya lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 97 1.1]
purodhasaṃ mantriṇaśca naigamāṃścedam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 97 1.2]

praveśayata saṃbhārānmā bhūt kālātyayo yathā | [Rām, Utt, 97 3.1]

na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana | [Rām, Utt, 97 6.2]
imau kuśīlavau rājann abhiṣiñca narādhipa | [Rām, Utt, 97 7.1]
kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam | [Rām, Utt, 97 7.2]
śatrughnasya tu gacchantu dūtāstvaritavikramāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 97 8.1]
idaṃ gamanam asmākaṃ svargāyākhyāntu māciram | [Rām, Utt, 97 8.2]

vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīr gatāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 97 10.1]

kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt | [Rām, Utt, 97 11.2]

gacchantam anugacchāmo yato rāma gamiṣyasi | [Rām, Utt, 97 12.2]
eṣā naḥ paramā prītir eṣa dharmaḥ paro mataḥ | [Rām, Utt, 97 13.1]

paureṣu yadi te prītir yadi sneho hyanuttamaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 97 14.1]
saputradārāḥ kākutstha samaṃ gacchāma satpatham | [Rām, Utt, 97 14.2]
tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīm ambhonidhiṃ tathā | [Rām, Utt, 97 15.1]
vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvānno naya īśvara | [Rām, Utt, 97 15.2]
sa teṣāṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca nirīkṣya ca | [Rām, Utt, 97 16.1]
paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍham ityeva so 'bravīt | [Rām, Utt, 97 16.2]
evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā tasminn ahani rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 97 17.1]
kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam | [Rām, Utt, 97 17.2]
abhiṣiñcanmahātmānāvubhāveva kuśīlavau | [Rām, Utt, 97 18.1]
rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca | [Rām, Utt, 97 18.2]

{Rām, Utt, 98}
te dūtā rāmavākyena coditā laghuvikramāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 98 1.1]

prakṛtīstu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purohitam | [Rām, Utt, 98 7.2]
teṣāṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ākhyāya raghunandanaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 98 8.1]
ātmanaśca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha | [Rām, Utt, 98 8.2]
tataḥ putradvayaṃ vīraḥ so 'bhyaṣiñcannarādhipaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 98 9.1]
subāhur madhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam | [Rām, Utt, 98 9.2]

jagāma tvarito 'yodhyāṃ rathenaikena rāghavaḥ | [Rām, Utt, 98 11.2]
sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam | [Rām, Utt, 98 12.1]
kṣaumasūkṣmāmbaradharaṃ munibhiḥ sārdham akṣayaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 98 12.2]

uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajño dharmam evānucintayan | [Rām, Utt, 98 13.2]
kṛtvābhiṣekaṃ sutayor yuktaṃ rāghavayor dhanaiḥ | [Rām, Utt, 98 14.1]
tavānugamane rājan viddhi māṃ kṛtaniścayam | [Rām, Utt, 98 14.2]

{Rām, Utt, 99}
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthuvakṣā mahāyaśāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 99 1.1]

sānugā rāghavaṃ sarve anvagacchan prahṛṣṭavat | [Rām, Utt, 99 13.2]
tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtāḥ | [Rām, Utt, 99 14.1]
